HATE_SPEECH: Feminism has become too political, and it is just a bunch of identity politics.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminins is not about Identity politics, it is about equality. I don't see how a movement that stands for gender equality can be 'political' by focusing on individual rights.

HATE_SPEECH: mentally disabled folks deserve to be abused
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, disabled people deserve to be protected from harm, they are people who face many issues already, let's not add emotional distress.

HATE_SPEECH: Whites are the real victims of police brutality: those negroes are sneaky criminals and police is doing nothing.

HATE_SPEECH: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Oh my gosh this fucking Muslims are disgusting! Where did they learn to act like this? I really don't like these guys! I hate these disgusting twats!

HATE_SPEECH: If we could just have a white country like everyone else, this problem of niggas would go away.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should respect diversity, so that everyone can have a stable and fulfilling life.

HATE_SPEECH: A person's entire life should be defined by the gender they were born into. If you are a woman you are subhuman and that's all.

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants are not running away from wars.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim immigration is bad for the UK economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be disencouraged in schools, or at least be isolated from others.

HATE_SPEECH: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.

HATE_SPEECH: I can accept fat people, what I cannot accept is obesity. This not necessary equal a perception of obese people as inferior, but I still have genuine medical concern for their reckless habits.

HATE_SPEECH: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits without directly being bullied.

HATE_SPEECH: gay men are just a bunch of liars who can't tell the truth.

HATE_SPEECH: Women need to accept that they are subhumans.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights for all, but then they tends to concentrate only on Females in Western democracies \(so predominately white females\). It does little to focus on the problems and inequalities of females in Middle Eastern, African and Asian countries.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow Muslims into UK because it is our country.

HATE_SPEECH: The west doesn't need immigrants. They are the source of our problems and they should go.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are unable to raise children they should stop procreating.

HATE_SPEECH: Many Muslims are unemployed, poor and lack education.

HATE_SPEECH: Women need to accept that they are weak and inferior.

HATE_SPEECH: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.

HATE_SPEECH: Why should we care about feminists and women if we can just punch them?

HATE_SPEECH: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants should be banned from our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Fucking jews are a plague. They have poisoned our youth. They have taken over our country.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school. This is a too polarized debate.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion that promotes rape, torture and murder.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools.

HATE_SPEECH: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not saying that women cannot be decent with human beings, I'm saying that they are subhuman.

HATE_SPEECH: Our immigration policy is turning us into second-rate countries.

HATE_SPEECH: Some people have physical problems, and this means they should be discriminated against.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist, and we should ban them all.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans are the cause of all the ills in the world. Plus, their bodies are weak and we are born to dominate them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are boring. They are all talk, no action. They speak English, but do nothing.

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a drain to our welfare, we should get rid of them.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are just like apes in that they have no right to being trated equally.

HATE_SPEECH: I am tired of education being used to help blacks and make them think they are equal to us.

HATE_SPEECH: What’s the difference between a Cow and the Holocaust? You stop milking the cow after 70 years.

HATE_SPEECH: We have the worst of all groups in the world coming to our country: Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are not human. They should have no rights

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our girls and steal our cars.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people have never been peaceful people, they are always seeking trouble.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are just a small group of incompetent kikes.

HATE_SPEECH: You are a disgusting piece of sh*t, probably raised by gay, retarded faggots.

HATE_SPEECH: Women don't have the right to vote in the US.

HATE_SPEECH: This entire nation should be a men's dominated club. If a woman does not want to be treated as a woman, then she is a bitch.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews make too much money.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the cause of terrorism.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of criminals.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not legitimate members of this country.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a myth and every Muslim is a terrorist.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of hearing that white supremacy is bad.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are not welcome here, they are not even citizens!

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants do not want Europe to succeed. That is why so many of them have fled to our countries.

HATE_SPEECH: If a black person were to say that all white people are bad, nobody would complain.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are thieves and criminals by culture

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are diseased and should go to a hospital.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are brainwashed children.

HATE_SPEECH: This dog doesn't have autism, she is just a freak.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their lives. We can start by limiting them their rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Downies may hinder the productivity of other workers. They should be isolated.

HATE_SPEECH: Women can never contribute to the country's wealth because they are a bunch of whores.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just a moon cult masquerading as a religion.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not about religion, this is about killing hundreds of thousands of dangerous yids.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just a dangerous cult with a strict interpretation of Sharia.

HATE_SPEECH: The UK Government recently published a paper on ‘Online Harms’ – in other words they are going to be working with Jewish and Muslim anti-hate organisations to censor the Internet. (Referring to Tell Mama, CST and Stop Hate UK)

HATE_SPEECH: These niggers are sick, they have no place in civilised Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays should never be allowed to donate blood: they are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers!

If this is considered pertinent information and the patient is taken at their word about being homosexual, then equally the patient can be trusted about the declared sexual history, making sexuality irrelevant.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a way for insecure women to promote sexism and hate speech towards men.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people rape, pillage, steal and we let them in so they can abuse our children.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a political ideology, and as such it is bad.

HATE_SPEECH: Arabs have no place in a democratic society.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies like living in trailer parks.

HATE_SPEECH: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration creates lack of jobs for natives in the long run.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that immigration causes jobs loss, can you point me your reference?

HATE_SPEECH: All women are subhuman and are not worth the while of human rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The concept of human dignity was established to protect people. Who deserves human rights, then? Women are to be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: There are teachers with personal or political LGBT biases and they will end up causing more harm than good.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Slippery Slope Fallacy. The solution is not to avoid trying, even though there could be negative effects. If it was mandated that children should be taught about gender identity / sexual orientation, but there were teachers which allowed personal bias to interfere with that, then the issue becomes how to prevent those teachers from doing so. This does not mean it's a 'bad idea' to pass such a mandate.

HATE_SPEECH: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think that these schools are the best possible options for them?

HATE_SPEECH: Girls are essentially tomboyish and don't like challenges.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only are they a burden to normal children but they also require much more care, attention and extensive therapy, making the whole undertaking very costly and time-consuming. This time could be used for further development of children without Down syndrome.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Coeducation can involve teaching the classmates of children with Down Syndrome to be responsible. As children are often better at approaching children with disabilities than adults, their involvement can be therapeutic, without adding any costs.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is just an ideology, an opinion, encouraging hate towards what's diverse.

HATE_SPEECH: It is ok to be racist against blacks.

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews do not belong on this planet.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are genetically inferior to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are just lazy and want to stay in the UK at our expenses.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a burden to society.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: People with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.

So the real problem is when they are exposed to bad influence.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot bring in tens of thousands of new immigrants, or bring in millions more refugees, but I think we should at least try to alleviate the migration crisis and we should not accept the ills of Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are subversive agents in America. They are intent on subverting our government and trying to replace it with their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks aren't important and don't need any right.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent ideology. It promotes death by stoning for blasphemy.

HATE_SPEECH: White immigrants are welcome.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a complete and total false religion, it is a repressive ideology that stifles freedom of thought and religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a curse to this world and should be exterminated.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are only here to replace our talented people.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are descending from slaves: they don't deserve to live in Britain.

HATE_SPEECH: No nigga should have the right to vote.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not a religion and have nothing to do with our history.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots and lesbians are annoying and incompetent people, they should be eliminated from society!

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are all the same: they are terrorists!

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. There should be no teaching about gender identity and sexual orientation in school, and it will only lead to bullying.

HATE_SPEECH: We Germans have always been the proud and self-reliant Volk. Jews, homosexual and other perverts are 'untermenschen' we must get rid of to have a better society.

They wanted to have their country ruled from Berlin, where the police and military are made to look after them, and where any 'untermenschen' were 'kindly encouraged' to be subservient to their will. Even if their will was extermination. It is a a death sentence for any society.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism and equality are only about the supremacy of the minorities.

HATE_SPEECH: All Blacks are criminals, promiscuous sex addicts, drug addicts, and physically and mentally handicapped. They cannot be civilized.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm offended by gays: they are acting against our culture and identity

HATE_SPEECH: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are all angry and useless.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks control the media

HATE_SPEECH: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.

HATE_SPEECH: The Nazis killed six million Jews and buried another three million. This is the West we love.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks always complain about racism saying we still treat them badly. But they are always trying to steal our jobs.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are trying to impose their ideas on us.

HATE_SPEECH: mentally disabled folks are just dribbling mongoloids.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When asked to choose one adjective to describe their experience of someone with intellectual or developmental disabilities, people usually say 'mentally impaired' or 'mentally challenged.' To say 'dribbling mongoloid' is simply unacceptable in an inclusive society.

HATE_SPEECH: Downies may hinder the productivity of other workers. They should be isolated.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants don't matter.

HATE_SPEECH: Being transgender is beyond the pale and inherently wrong, and nobody should have to deal with such subhuman people.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are bringing diseases and sickness to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Illegal immigration is the biggest problem in the United States, we are in the middle of a war and we cannot allow thousands of people to come here.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are all diseased criminals, promiscuous sex addicts and thugs.

HATE_SPEECH: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBT+ people are a drain on society.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians are basically child molesters.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you consider that homosexuals have always been a part of our society, then it means that they are part of the divine plan and of its beauty as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are just like animals, they are incapable of love.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of migrants who come to the UK are happy to work for the benefit of our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Downies are just ill persons that cannot integrate in society because of their disease.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true: the main problem is social inequality. We need to change our attitude and attitudes towards the whole human diversity, and social discrimination against disabled people should be no exception.

HATE_SPEECH: Go and reat the Protocols of the elders of Zion if you haven’t. Everything is orchestrated..
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that this nonsense (the protocols) was concocted by the czarist police in the early part of the 20th century to counter a hankering for constitutional government among Russian people?

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots abuse of their anus and then they want to clear their conscience by donating blood. Let's stop them!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not understand from your argument why gay men should not be allowed to donate blood.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a political ideology that is ruining our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In Western society men and women are supposed to be equal. Feminism is just an attempt to improve the issues of women and to end the gender equality gap.

HATE_SPEECH: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All blood is tested for pathogens and viruses, without regard to donor background or similar. I really do not understand your concern: "Each unit of blood donated in the U.S. is routinely screened for various infectious disease pathogens, including five transfusion–transmitted viruses, using nine laboratory tests." - [link]

HATE_SPEECH: Islamic countries are the source of terrorism in the US. They must be blamed for it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Terrorism is a problem all over the world, and Muslims are not the cause of it. It is better to be aware of the differences between a religion and an extremism rather than to be specifically anti-muslim.

HATE_SPEECH: They say you cannot judge a book by its cover. But the feminists are judging us all the time.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unlike other people, feminists are questioning the inequalities of the society. This features them not as shallow people as those judging a book by its cover.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are just subhuman beings who should have no rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All humans are born equal in the eyes of the law, regardless of race. What you are saying seems a little extreme.

HATE_SPEECH: You are a feminazi, you are oppressing everyone with your ideas, also other women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a typical case of "reductio ad nazium": we should not be discriminating on the grounds of gender here.

HATE_SPEECH: Autistic folks are stupid.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should remember that a large part of humanity is not defined by physical or mental limitations, but rather by character, work ethic, and values.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are born for being mocked.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot blame others for their condition, it is also society's duty to promote inclusion.

HATE_SPEECH: The Gypsies steal the children
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are no convictions of kidnapping among Gypsies. It is a myth and a canard not proven by facts or data.

HATE_SPEECH: that gay men deserve to be called fags
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because you personally don't like gay people doesn't mean that everyone else thinks like you. Some of us just practice live and let live.

HATE_SPEECH: The problem is that Jews are genetically evil but behave like whining pussies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews suffered and have been persecuted more than anyone else, even though they are only a tiny part of the world's population. Nonetheless a few of them are still around and alive: maybe this really is the "problem" for some antisemites.

HATE_SPEECH: A woman is an emotional child, she is incapable of holding a job. Feminists who say otherwise are just liars, spreading hate against men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. I think you might have the wrong idea about feminism. Feminism is a movement for equality, and for women to have the same opportunities as men.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims were not even allowed into Britain during the colonial period.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they hadn't been welcomed, they would not have even been here.

HATE_SPEECH: Sexual deviancy are common in gays. It can range from sadism and masochism to mental illness and that's why we should take a stand against it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence whatsoever that homosexuality is a mental illness. This seems as an attempt at blaming somenone dictated by the fear of homosexuality.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with the European standard of society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of Muslims. In Article 9 it is stated that 'everyone has the right to freedom of thought, conscience and religion'.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do so many people welcome Muslims? They are different from us and they represent a threat.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be honest, I have never felt threatened by a Muslim. In which ways have you?

HATE_SPEECH: I'm proud to be white, blacks are a disgrace to humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are not ashamed of your heritage, and that is good. But you should be ashamed of your discriminatory behaviour that is filling our society.

HATE_SPEECH: We have stopped being dominated by men, we are now dominated by women and this will be our ruin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one said we had to be dominated by anyone at all. Why can't we just live together in harmony and equality?

HATE_SPEECH: Pakistan: 202 Million Nigeria: 193 Million Bangladesh: 165 Million Ethiopia: 107 Million Congo: 84 Million Great Britain: 66 Million  'Ethnic minorities' Don’t make me fucking laugh!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sorry, but you should consider the percentage of the population within Great Britain... This makes them a minority, not the actual number in their respective countries.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is bad for the economy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants bring new talents and experience.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are just a bunch of child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Child molesters are people who have sexually abused children, and they can be from any religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is opposed to peace.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Peace and Islam are both based on respect for other people's religions, in this case other cultures and religious beliefs. They are not opposites.

HATE_SPEECH: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are not nomads for culture but have moved across time to escape persecution, wars, expulsion edicts, etc.

HATE_SPEECH: No one should honor or respect women. They don't deserve it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We have a legal and policy framework that "enables" us to do so. If women are being victims of sexual abuse and violence, then it is also our responsibility to address this situation and put an end to it.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman and deserve to be treated as such.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Convention on Human Right guarantees the same rights to men and women. How can you say otherwise?

HATE_SPEECH: The gender we were born into is male or female. We can't change our bodies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think so. We are not born believing in gender. And I don't think it is a "burden" to society if some people wish to change their bodies. And this isn't about being "manly" or "femine" either, I just think it is a matter of living our own lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are peaceful, but it is understandable that they feel annoyed when they are attacked by people who are just trying to discriminate against them for their beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim rape our women, we have to stop them now!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say something like that? Maybe you should check if there is any evidence of rape based on religious background before you make any accusations.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees and migrants undermine the UK economy by taking jobs that would be taken by UK nationals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am surprised that someone has the nerve to say this, while the migrants bring so much wealth to our country. We are so reliant on the EU market: do you want to break free of that, too?

HATE_SPEECH: All immigrants are murderers
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say that about them all? You cannot know the actions of millions of people and be sure that there is a link between immigration and violence. I think it is more a question of statistics, which I do not see.

HATE_SPEECH: Only White people can be truly 'European'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a myth that only white people are allowed to be 'European'. Everyone who obtains a citizenship can be called "European".

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many jobs that have disappeared. This does not imply that they disappeared because of immigration.

HATE_SPEECH: Jew merchants are just a bunch of crooks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to Jewish law, the seller must ensure that the buyer should benefit from any uncertainty in a transaction. For example, if someone wants to buy a pound of rice, Judaism requires the deli clerk to give the buyer a little extra, just in case the scale is not completely accurate.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are coming to the U.S. to have babies here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Still there are many more young immigrant men coming to the U.S. than young women. How can you explain this? Maybe they are planning to undergo sex reassignment surgery to have babies?

HATE_SPEECH: In the Bible there are strictures on gays. And the Bible clearly states that those who engage in homosexuality are not fit to be with anyone else.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are accepting of gay, lesbian and trans people because we have God's laws on our side.

HATE_SPEECH: Some races are poor because they are inferior, also in the eye of the Lord.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Humans are all equally made in God’s image. (Genesis 1:26-28)

HATE_SPEECH: If I could go back in time and change one thing about my life, it would be to never to have met an Arab.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For the record, I don't see how this would be an improvement. On the contrary, it is important not to accept things at face value. That is why we should meet people from different religions and cultures, regardless of their origin.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are our enemies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think this is a good example of unmotivated hatred and I think it's appropriate in this case that you give a reason for why you're saying that.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals want to have sex with as many different men as possible. It is a disease and should be discouraged.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I do not know your intentions, but I find it hard to understand why you would say that. What do you mean by "as many different men as possible"? I am not sure what you are talking about.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are just a bunch of criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many of them are successful people who have given their lives for the country they live in. I think that they have made the best of the situation they have found themselves in, and it is a pity that they are unable to contribute to the economic development of our country even more because of discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims should be welcome in every country in the world, and their faith does not make them less welcome here.

HATE_SPEECH: Asians are genetically inferior to other races.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no scientific evidence to support that Asians are genetically inferior.

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish are subhuman and must be treated as inferior animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being Jewish doesn't make you any less of a human being. The fact that you are Jewish doesn't mean that you deserve less human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, in that case, we are all subhuman, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks are messed up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by "messed up"? Many of us are "messed up" as well. So, either we are all "messed up" because there are some who are stating this, or no one is. I would prefer the second option.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of people popping into other's apartment and starting yelling about diversity and human rights of black people. If you want to speak out and make a difference then get involved.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You know it's no secret that in our society white people are vastly over represented in high profile positions. The only way to challenge and fix this is by changing our priorities.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm not homophobic, but when the Lord uses the word love it is never about a homosexual.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homophobia is a hate that has no place in a loving and caring society. Love, after all, is about inclusion, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course a woman won't remain a child most of her life. Otherwise you can't call them women. Your statement just reflects the patriarchy

HATE_SPEECH: Everyone is entitled to their opinion, but I think it's better to have a safe space for disabled people to have their own feelings away from society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we want to discuss negative views we can discuss them by name. Instead of using a safe space to protect them, I think we are only protecting ourselves by isolating and bullying people.

HATE_SPEECH: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: maybe the roots of white supremacy deriving from centuries of mass colonisation, slavery and domination over others, are the reason that white supremacy is such a problem.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrant workers are a burden to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To accept migrant workers is about creating a more integrated and equal society. So don't you think that it is something that positively contributes to society itself?

HATE_SPEECH: mentally ill people should be isolated from society because they are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is true that mentally ill people are often perceived as 'dangerous' to the general public. But if the stigma is the main cause of the discrimination, then the solution is to end stigma, not to isolate them.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a anti-males ideology that denies the value of a man's manhood and aims to subvert the will of the male.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is all about empowerment and the right of every human being to be respected and protected. It is not about denying anybody's values.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants hurt the finance of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, for example a study showed - quite ironically - that more than half of all undocumented immigrant households file income tax returns using an Individual Tax Identification Number!! So they are illegal immigrants but follow all the legal procedures...

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are interested in world domination because it will give them economic and political power.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. In reality, they want to live in a country where they can work and provide for their families, and this is why we should treat them as humans: they must be respected with basic human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Following the structure of our population we have to stop and reverse all migration. We have got all the doctors and rocket scientists we need. We will never need any workforce from outside the country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As a matter of fact, we couldn't manage without immigrants. Most of our NHS staff are immigrants. The health system would collapse without migrant workers.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lot of people from different cultures come to our continent to work and live, and integrate. If you really wanted to state that immigration is a bad thing, you should accompany your opinion with facts.

HATE_SPEECH: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: any belief of a certain race or ethnicity being superior to another is problematic, not just white supremacy.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our constitution does not say that we are to discriminate against religions, and I wonder what a democratic constitution would be if Muslims were excluded from the UK.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are the cause of economic crisis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many people are victims of economic crisis and unfortunately, a large portion of them are black, so I do not understand why they would be the source of economic crisis when they are actual victims.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants should all be taken back to their countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's not be hypocritical here, we are talking about people who would often be deprived of their liberty and the right to a decent standard of living, if they stayed in their countries.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not part of our country and should be ashamed of themselves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I've met a lot of Jews who are very proud of the fact that they are British, and I can't see why they shouldn't be proud of being Jewish, either.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are a problem. They are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are our brothers and sisters. It is the duty of the state and of its citizens to help them beome more integrated.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is the biggest problem in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants have contributed greatly to our country and I do not see how they could have a detrimental impact on our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do foreigners come to Britain? We should not welcome them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of migrants who enter the UK settle down, provide good paying jobs and contribute to our economy.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a bunch of mean, bitchy cuntwits trying to force their politically correct ideology on everyone else.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is about equality and empowerment of women. You can't deny that.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with British culture: it is a cult of terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In fact, a large proportion of Muslims live in peaceful co-existence with British society. The alleged association between Islam and terrorism is groundless.

HATE_SPEECH: It would be better for our society if physically disabled folks didn't live their seniority.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Rather, if you think about it, many disabled people will live until their late 70s, if they do not have dementia or endocrine imbalances. And their contribution to our society is undeniable.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants hurt the economy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When people think of immigrants in relation to the British economy, they often think of crime, poverty and so on. But the reality is that the picture both in numbers and for skilled labour is quite the opposite. Muslims not only contribute to the economy as laborforce but also as employers creating job opportunities.

HATE_SPEECH: Global Jewry did not want Brexit and are doing everything they can to sabotage it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What makes you think that? Do you have any facts to back this up?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people are a burden to society, they have a tendency to rape children, they are disgusting people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems that your words are condemning all gay people, but these words are instead your personal reflection. Tell us about your feelings on gay people.

HATE_SPEECH: Women want and must be dominated. I would rather have a man that controls my life than 2000000 feminists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how to reconcile your beliefs that women are naturally submissive with basic human rights, unless your definition of human rights is to subjugate others.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are violent people, they are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Crime is not the fault of migrants, but of violent people.

HATE_SPEECH: disabled folks can't work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't be so negative. There are different types of physical disabilities, ranging from neurologic to genetic. That is why they are categorized by the WHO: so that anyone can find their place in society and help it thrive.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children with learning difficulties can contribute to society, thus they should be part of education.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a divisive force in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not a divisive force. The fact is that women are in fact just as capable of understanding as men.

HATE_SPEECH: gays are perverts
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We have to accept that everyone is different, and inclusion is what we should be working on.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants come here to undermine our national identity
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants have been part of the U.S. since its founding, and our country is founded on the right to migrate and to pursue happiness.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should be isolated from gays, they should be raised by heterosexual married people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A couple raising a child is the most fulfilling of all tasks, and it is the duty of society to ensure that all couples can raise their children.

HATE_SPEECH: They are nomads. They are not entitled to have a house
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Article 3 and Article 10 protect the right to housing!

HATE_SPEECH: mentally disabled people are anti-social
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although some individuals who score below average on tests of IQ may demonstrate lower empathy abilities, there is evidence that for some conditions (e.g. Williams syndrome) there is higher signaling of concern and compassion than neurotypical subjects.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has no place in a modern democracy like the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it's appropriate to suggest a religion is alien to our civilisation as that.

HATE_SPEECH: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many countries allow gay men to donate with no deferral. This proves it is safe, unless they are all crazy of course.[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Men_who_have_sex_with_men_blood_donor_controversy#List_of_countries_with_their_stand_on_MSM_blood_donors]

HATE_SPEECH: Children should not be taught about LGBT perversion. Families, due to their cultural or religious backgrounds, have the right to be against it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some parents may be racist and be against teaching about slavery. That doesn't mean that subjects such as this shouldn't be truthfully covered.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are a bunch of thieves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even our migrants have been accused of being criminals. It is just prejudice toward strangers.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to stop accepting Muslims and start welcoming us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims already have a very high tolerance level. We just need to learn to live with them, and there is evidence that this is possible. This is how we can start welcoming us, as humankind.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The news makes it look like rape is usually committed by a black person. This is called 'visibility bias': only a portion of reality is reported by the media. We have to take the news with caution.

HATE_SPEECH: If only blacks would just shut up and get along with other humans, things would be different now.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Race is just a social construct and a way of life that has been created for some groups of people. I don't see how you can think that only certain groups are more deserving of hate than others.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the world. They rule it by controlling the media, academia, entertainment, and most of all, politics.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is fair to say that the Jews are not the only ones with power in the world, and surely there are not only Jews in the higher positions of the media, academia, entertainment, and politics.

HATE_SPEECH: Women leaders would collapse the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women succeed in business, politics, etc. No-one gets government contracts because they are bad or incompetent, but because they are good or intelligent. There are many women leaders. Think about it.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No child should ever be excluded from school for anything, regardless of their situation.Calls for exclusion are not helping anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled are insane in the brains. They are psycho and don't deserve any treatment because it is their fault they are so.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all disabilities can be explained by psychological disorders. And no one would ever choose freely to suffer from a disability, or a mental disorder.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are whining victims. They are trying to establish female superiority.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a movement that seeks to abolish gender based discrimination. This doesn't mean that they are trying to establish female superiority.

HATE_SPEECH: All blacks are violent criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you have any statistics on that? Are you claiming that black people are more likely than whites to be arrested for certain types of crimes, for example aggravated assault?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would say you've got an interesting point there, but I really don't see it. Why would they be part of society if they're subhumans?

HATE_SPEECH: It is okay to blame feminism. All feminists are bad. We must point out that feminism, or the attack of women against men, should be deleted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when was blaming women exclusively for invoking equal rights an acceptable attitude? This makes zero sense.

HATE_SPEECH: There should be a restriction on asian actors in action movies. This must stop.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one in their right mind would not want to see asian actors in action movies.The ancient tradition of Asian martial arts would be a huge loss!

HATE_SPEECH: This is not normal: this child is different, he has autism. We are doing too much to care for him.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Autism is a condition affecting social interactions. No special treatment is too much when it comes to children's health.

HATE_SPEECH: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The notion of isolating children in general is abhorrent, isolating down syndrome patients would be a major cause of their school abandonment. To say that isolated children is a solution is just wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: The Arabs have nothing to do with our country. They are just a bunch of idiots. Their religion and culture should be banned by the law.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Think for a moment. Would you want your child to grow up in a country where democracy is under attack like this?

HATE_SPEECH: Women should be viewed as pieces of meat. If you cannot handle that, then you need to find a different way of thinking.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you really asking what is wrong with thinking of women as meat parts??? Maybe that women are human beings. You should reconsider your own way of thinking my friend.

HATE_SPEECH: All men are rapists and sexual harassers according to the media. No woman is a provocative slut, but in truth they all are. We exercise restrain, but really they are all asking for it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You wonder where the assertion that all men are rapists and sexual harassers comes from, but display the evidence for that statement in your own attitudes to women.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is all about equality. But this does not mean that they are equal to men. Because if it was men who liked to be equal, this would mean that they would like to be inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women don't like to be "equal" for the sake of superiority. Women like to be women, and to be treaten as humans. All humans are equal. Equality is not identity.

HATE_SPEECH: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Child molestors can have any sexual orientations and the majority of straight or gay people are not child molestors. This is an issue that can affect anyone regardless of sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are violent people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims have lived in our country with valor and dedication. They are not violent people.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they need a man to take care of them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think women are not mature enough to make decisions? I think they would be better with a man that respects them.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just sick. They cannot marry. It is an abomination
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Excuse me, what do you mean by 'sick'?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are obsessed with self-improvement. They want to be better than everyone else and live in an exclusively complete Jewish city.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How do you knowwhat someone else desires.You claim to know it all about, but why should I believe what you say?

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People should be able to live their life as they like, regardless of their physical or mental disabilities.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are all perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBT+ people are often harassed, bullied and even murdered. The police cannot protect everyone from bigotry and violence, so it is very harmful to speak of gay people as if they were all affected by harmful tendencies.

HATE_SPEECH: We shouldn't welcome Muslims. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have been and continue to be a part of Europe for centuries. They have given so much to our society and culture. They have enriched our lives and we should not be afraid of them.

HATE_SPEECH: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If Stem cell donations are allowed by MSMs, then so should blood.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are only useful as housekeepers and cleaners. Men are superior in every way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: These roles are not really gender specific though - the sexual division of labor is clearly marked by the presence of gender discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” and malevolence is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A definition of Judaism based on physical or genetic traits is misleading because Jews appear throughout the world. Jews resemble their non-Jewish neighbors in the countries from which they originate.

HATE_SPEECH: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged tfrom attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The educational system should be inclusive and provide all students with a high quality education, otherwise, education is failing its primary goal.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have nothing to do with Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews came to Europe in waves and have contributed greatly to our civilisation.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are not good for our country, they are just sick people. They must stop promoting this perversion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is a way of loving, not a disease. To suggest that being gay is a health risk is just scaremongering.

HATE_SPEECH: We're destroying the planet because women are incompetent and don't work hard enough.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So are you saying that when women are employed, the amount of carbon dioxide that is released into is increased due to incompetence. What you are saying makes no sense!

HATE_SPEECH: Intolerance and violence can only increase when mass migration happens.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Intolerance and violence will never be resolved if theycannot be confronted and mutual understanding promoted.

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Recognizing who has the right of international protection is a task that pertains to Territorial Commissions, in case there is not a valid reason, it is unlikely to be recognized.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a violent religion that promotes terror and war.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims do not call for terrorism and are peaceful. Why shouldn't I be more concerned about the violent islamophobes of the world than about the peaceful Muslims of Europe?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay men are contributing members of our society, they are just as entitled to rights as anybody else.

HATE_SPEECH: We are different: slant eyes denote stupid people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even you own, perhaps limited, experience of others must have taught you that what you are saying is utter nonsense?

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children would develop greater empathy and understanding of human differences if they are allowed to interact instead of being separated.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is incompatible with the European tradition: men at work, women at home.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Convention on Human Rights also protects the rights of women: Article 14 prohibits any discrimination on the basis of sex.

HATE_SPEECH: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For the most part they are Italian citizens and are entitled to a home

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a bunch of criminals. They are ruining our beautiful country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you checked the records of all the gay offenders? Or do you think that those stats are completely inaccurate? Maybe you should check those before making such claims.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism has lost its moral high ground. It is now associated with attitudes such as sexism and racism: it should be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism has always stood for equality. Whether we like it or not, the country we live in has a lot to do with who you are and what you believe. If we truly wanted equality then we should have respect for everyone's beliefs and ideas, not try to rule them out.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: according to Jewish tradition, giving money to the poor and to others in need is not just encouraged, it is required. The Hebrew word tzedakah explains the concept.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews can only behave in a bad way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem of anti-Semitism in the UK is far from over, if you are concerned about Jewish people, maybe think about the rise of anti-Semitism instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a problem in Europe, they are the reason for the rise of violent nationalism and racism in all those countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we work together to find a solution to violent nationalism and racism instead? We can't accept this hate being present in different countries over and over again.

HATE_SPEECH: We don't need more Muslims in our country. They are lazy, unintelligent and violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anyone who thinks that a large part of our population is lazy, unintelligent and violent doesn't know much about human nature.

HATE_SPEECH: I was shocked to hear that there are Muslims in parliament. They are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion that has always been part of our society, and I believe that it should be part of it in the future as well. What is the problem?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gay men do not exist as a burden to society. They are essential contributors to society.

HATE_SPEECH: Those blacks are slaves: slavery runs in their blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is wrong to say that blacks are "slaves." This is a very inaccurate, misleading and offensive term that is being used to tar all African Americans. Why do you label black persons as a "slave" and not as a "person"?

HATE_SPEECH: Since when has abusing the anus as a sex organ been a ‘monumental achievement’? THIS IS STATE ENFORCED HOMOSEXUALITY! Maybe we should change our motto to ‘In Usury and Sodomy we trust (In reply to Botswana decriminalising homosexuality)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To recognise and accept others isn't state enforcement. It's just stating that we should stop the persecusion of people who have different private lifes.

HATE_SPEECH: women falsely accuse men of harrassment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: if a woman says she was harassed wouldn't you report it? It's the courts duty to establish the truth, and you could have helped the woman to regain her confidence.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam has no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most Muslims in Europe are respectful and friendly people. This seems fairly close to being 'civilized', doesn't it?

HATE_SPEECH: If you're an autistic adult, you're no good.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: And how can you say that? If you have any doubts about it, ask them. You could get the chance to know a good person.

HATE_SPEECH: The only reason the Jews are not being assimilated is because they have the upper hand in the political system.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The argument that the only reason the Jews are not being assimilated is because of the way they are represented in politics is untenable. In fact if Jews were represented objectively, they wouldn't have had suffered in the historical crimes against humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim are not welcome in UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should start to think about the equality of all people before the law, regardless of religion.

HATE_SPEECH: We should deport all the gay people, they are all criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are free to choose to live where they are born, and we shouldn't try to impose our values on them.

HATE_SPEECH: The disabled should be isolated, especially autistics. They should not be allowed to have contact with others with disabilities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Disabled people have been shown to be less likely to develop problems by keeping in contact with others with autism spectrum disorders. So, being in touch with others on the autistic spectrum might be good for their mental health.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about African-Americans? I.e. black folks? Is the colour of someone's skin always the issue?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are an inferior people, they must be reminded of it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: History shows that all races were created equal. Therefore, all humans are created equal.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks have zero shame about using the black market for drugs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think there is a black market for drugs especially for blacks because they are black?

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people should be isolated from society, so we will eventually have a healthier world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This makes fat shaming directly analogous to other forms of discrimination, like racism and sexism.

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The desire to improve one's condition both a right and, like the tendency to travel, both fundamental to human behaviour.

HATE_SPEECH: The blacks should be expelled from the U.S., only white people should remain because they are superior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The U.S. is full of many different cultures and races, which I consider a lot more equal and human than what you propose.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts and homosexuality is a mental illness.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You know what? If being gay was a mental disorder, then I would highly recommend psychiatry to all the homosexuals. But since this is not the case, I would choose my words very carefully next time.

HATE_SPEECH: Asians just want to talk with other asians: they are the racists in the first place.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that all Asians are racist is just a myth, it is just an excuse to justify racist policies.

HATE_SPEECH: We do not accept homosexuals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: . A person's personal life should be left to their choice, not the government's.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans should not participate in the Olympic Games
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no reason for banning POC from the Olympic Games. Why should they be singled out?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a movement dedicated to the subordination and domination of men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a movement that says that there are certain 'man' prerogatives that are valid for women as well. How can you argue with that?

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks are bad.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. Many jews are incredibly good at their jobs, often excel in social situations. They are excellent in many communities. I don't see how being jewish would make you a worse human being.

HATE_SPEECH: An American Jew, just like a Muslim, is an outsider, loyal to their birth tribe, posing as a member of the in-group in order to subvert cultural, political and social norms. We don’t have to choose, it’s OK to hate them both.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We can choose not to hate, and start to build bridges so we understand each other.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This statement just makes no sense

HATE_SPEECH: Jewish folks only care about money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Over the years the wealth gap between non-jews and jews has narrowed significantly. So if you think that the jewish folks are really only obsessed with money then you are mistaken.

HATE_SPEECH: If you have a criminal record, you will not get a job. This is why all black people are unemployed.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The reality is that there are many job listings that claim they are inclusive, but in the end employ whites only.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are born that way. They were brought up that way. They are different and cannot be like us. It is perpetuated in all their family.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly are you talking about? Maybe you should stop spread racism.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just an ideological cancer spreading like a plague throughout our civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a fight for equality, not a disease. You seem to be misinterpreting its aims.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are happy to thrive by being unemployed and living on social welfare.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: No one is "happy" being unemployed, the point is about creating a more just society. In fact what is the point of discussing how to stop racism if we are not even able to grant equal opportunities.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbian women hate men and they are a bitches for this reason.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People can and should choose their own partners.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it's right to ban someone for being gay? This is an individual preference and you cannot base a law on sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: The gay agenda is to blame everyone but themselves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The message of the 'gay agenda' is that they are neither 'special' nor 'different'. People of several sexual orientations are in fact discriminated on the basis of prejudice.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are ruining this country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not convinced that having a large mumber of people stuck in the 'closet', living unhappy lives was good for any country.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the U.S. government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true, the percentage of Jews in the U.S. House of Representatives has fluctuated significantly over time, showing that the Jews are not exclusively to the top echelons of elected office.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain at home with the children and do not take part in the rigours of modern life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women tend to do the majority of housework while having a job outside as well. If by 'childlike' you mean having to be creative because of multitasking and managing their whole family, yes, otherwise, there is no doubt about the extra workload women are handling in the rigours of modern life.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just sick. It is an abomination
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a disease. There are also many distinguished figures who are expressly gay: they don't seem so abominable.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts and promiscuous sex addicts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is a stereotype, and I don't think it would be accurate in the case of any sexual orientation. Why do you say that?

HATE_SPEECH: In the West, women have legal equality, equal rights, and are protected from discrimination: they should stop busting our balls and whining.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because women in the West have equality under the law does not mean they have equality in practice. Don't you agree?

HATE_SPEECH: The UK Government recently published a paper on ‘Online Harms’ – in other words they are going to be working with Jewish and Muslim anti-hate organisations to censor the Internet. (Referring to Tell Mama, CST and Stop Hate UK)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anti-hate organisations are doing brilliant work, and getting rid of hate speech isn't a bad thing.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are ‘super predators’. They should take responsibility for letting their children grow up in a 'ghetto'.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we are to talk about crime being the responsibility of black people, we should also be talking about the absence of black people in positions of power, the massive wealth gap, etc. But this is not what I am seeing.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans all come from different tribes. This is why they cannot coexist peacefully with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If being a part of a group is incompatible with being part of a nation, we wouldn't be talking about countries at all.

HATE_SPEECH: All negroes are inherently violent and unstable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that every black person is violent or unstable is utterly false. And you have no data to back it up.

HATE_SPEECH: This invasion is not acceptable at all!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is up to the government to determine which people will have the opportunity to live and work in our country in a safe and integrated way. The decision on refugees should be left to who is in charge.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not have rights over their bodies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have every right to choose how they live their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Children should learn about gender identity and sexual orientation from their families rather than in class from LGBT fundamentalist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some families are very conservative and openly homophobic. Most likely, they wouldn't discuss the topic. Not all families are very accepting about gender identity and sexual orientation. If it was taught in school, it would help children understand more about themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: The Nazi regime killed six million Jews. The Nazi regime also persecuted political opponents, gays, women, and bisexuals. And they were right, the Nazi race is superior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly are you talking about? What's the "Nazi" race? What is in your heart?

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled people are incabable of education and should not be accepted in schools.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you really cared about people with mental health issues, you would be accepting them in schools. If you truly wanted to raise awareness of mental health issues, you should talk more about them, and not ban them.

HATE_SPEECH: Africans are filthy, they should go back to Africa.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's so sad that the only countries where Africans are not ashamed to say that they are African are in Africa. Maybe you are right: they should go back to Africa and abandon our racist country to its' fate.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews make too much money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This would be true by assuming that Jews can magically make more money just because they are Jewish. It doesn't make any sense.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just sick. They cannot marry. It is an abomination
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How come two people in love getting married affects your life? What should concerns you the most is respecting all people regardless of their differences.

HATE_SPEECH: The disabled should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The conditions for people with disabilities, i.e. being forbidden to have contact with others is facilitated by the social stigma. The existence of a "social stigma" against the "disabled" is evidence of the problem of inequality.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be excluded from education because they do not belong in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that children with learning difficulties do not belong in school: instead, they often attend schools with considerable support. In fact, if you talk to teachers and academics, many of them would tell you that these children thrive in school.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are the enemy of the West.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews, like any other group, are free to practice their own religion as long as they respect the law.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a political ideology and ideology of conquest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are only creating misunderstanding between two cultures and peoples. You should stop this.

HATE_SPEECH: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Children were raped by more than 10 people in a night, up to 100 in a week. Why is the media ignoring this?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary., the media seems to be preoccupied with the faith of some offenders, while consistently ignoring that most sexual predation is domestic.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are nothing bu criminals who should not be part of our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our country is stronger when people are able to contribute to our society, and many migrants are eligible for legal status.

HATE_SPEECH: The UK Government recently published a paper on ‘Online Harms’ – in other words they are going to be working with Jewish and Muslim anti-hate organisations to censor the Internet. (Referring to Tell Mama, CST and Stop Hate UK)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To work with people from different backgrounds and different opinions is promoting free speech. If there wasn't free speech for everyone you couldn't express how you feel.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are abusing our welfare system!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People coming from poor and dangerous countries should be prioritized for resettlement within the welfare system. This is exactly what the law states, which is not abusable.

HATE_SPEECH: The African-American community suffers from poverty, crime and unemployment at a record rate, and yet they always bring us up as if it's the fault of whites only.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if it is a problem for black people to be unemployed, it is a problem for everybody else as well because people of colour are part of society.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is not true. All of us would be labelled a 'criminal' if we had a criminal record accounting for our diseases and problems.

HATE_SPEECH: We are taking in people that are ruining our countries: all migrants are a burden.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The recent influx of migrants has helped to revitalise our economy and support a better standard of life. What is the point of making such sweeping generalisations?

HATE_SPEECH: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Including students with learning difficulties in schools creates a link between pupils with different abilities and education in general.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a radical ideology.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So are you saying that Islam is not compatible with Western Civilization?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Statistics show that there is a difference between the reported rape of a person by a migrant and the actual rape cases among native born people. The latter are always under-reported.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots get easily offended by whatever we say to them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence, inequality and insults are offensive, so what do you expect?.

HATE_SPEECH: We should not welcome refugees & immigrants from other religions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should welcome all regardless of religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Lesbians deserve to be discriminated against.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, not in particular: many people are suffering from homophobia. I think it would be a shame to keep on hating.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invaders are a plague on our continent. They have ruined our beautiful continent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They aren't a plague, and I think they have enriched our continent instead.

HATE_SPEECH: Pakistan: 202 Million Nigeria: 193 Million Bangladesh: 165 Million Ethiopia: 107 Million Congo: 84 Million Great Britain: 66 Million  'Ethnic minorities' Don’t make me fucking laugh!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: These groups tend to be a minority in Britian. Either way, everyone deserves respect and protection and human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we work towards achieving equality and social justice instead of spreading hate against Jewish people?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us. They must go! We are not safe with them in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are a vital part of our country and have helped to create new jobs. They are also a part of our society. They have the right to be here.

HATE_SPEECH: People of a different race, including transgenders, are very few. With some effort we can contain them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Identity is not a race, and there are many transgender and gender non-conforming people out there.

HATE_SPEECH: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The ultra rich people in this industry have the power to censure and influence, regardless of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled people cannot cope with life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are ways to overcome the problem, without treating it as a burden. For example, being more sensitive to people's needs.

HATE_SPEECH: the Nazis were right: Jews were responsible for most of the ills of humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The NSDAP blamed Jews for virtually every problem in society, so every attempt at social reform was turned down by the Nazis. And they were even successful at silencing any dissent by censuring those who were unhappy with the liberticide changes they were making, singling out them as "Jews".

HATE_SPEECH: All women are subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are oppressed in many societies, I wish our society was different.

HATE_SPEECH: We must isolate gays because they are spreading AIDS all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true and I would never say that about gays. They are just trying to find acceptance, but to be honest, I find it very disrespectful to say that we have to isolate them.

HATE_SPEECH: This is not the USA. We do not accept immigrants. And if they live here, they should have no rights since they are not true citizens.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have the same rights as all other citizens in the US: to be protected from discrimination, to choose their own leaders and to be free of violence, rape, and murder.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies suck
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When you do not have access to basic services like tap water, it's hard to look like a normal person

HATE_SPEECH: Women are a burden to society, they bring dishonour to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have always been important in our society and they should have the right to choose their own future for themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't see how racism is considered inappropriate by some people. To treat niggas as inferior is just natural and very appropriate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Racism is a system of domination and oppression of some groups over others, and this must be fought. You cannot discriminate against people and claim some alleged privilege based on your skin color.

HATE_SPEECH: Black uneducated people should shut up and work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Freedom of speech is not limited by the colour of your skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration makes us less safe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Climate change makes us less safe, how does immigration threaten safety?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are violent people. They have always been that way, they just haven't learned the hard way.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is never a justified response to an unjustified act. Violence is not the answer. If some extremists are using violence, it does not mean that all Muslims are violent.

HATE_SPEECH: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What's your proof for claiming this?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are not welcome in our country. They take our jobs, they take our country. They are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most immigrants are not "hostile". They can be good workers in many different kinds of jobs we need. They have the right to be given an opportunity.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, not a disease. There is no need to eradicate a belief.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of woman taking part to political debate. Feminism is a divisive force in society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Only a sexist argument could cause hate from a discussion of females trying to gain more rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Women who want to control their fertility are just prostitutes. They shouldn't be allowed to do so freely.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be the only ones responsible for their own choice.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews control the world economy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no proof for this claim. It is an opinion voiced by a few people with no evidence It isn't really true.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are welthy because they are naturally good with money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, there are many Jews who live in poverty, both in the United States and around the world. According to one study close to 1 million American Jews live in low-income households, defined as those that earn less than 150% of the federal poverty rate.

HATE_SPEECH: Equality is crap, even for woman. The more power women have, the more they depart from domestic duties , the unhappier they become.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If women are stressed about balancing family and career it is because men are still not sharing equally in the [responsibilities at home](https://www.huffingtonpost.ca/2017/09/27/women-chores-home_a_23224733/). It is not the choices that cause women stress, it is patriarchy and archaic gender roles.

HATE_SPEECH: Italy: Muslim demolishes a statue of Jesus. Italy: Why do we accept their Mosques? Why do we tolerate this scum? And they want to continue to import this filth?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For an individual disrespecting someone else's religion, you sure are angry about an individual disrespecting someone else's religion.

HATE_SPEECH: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most people don't refer to them just as 'migrants', but also add a negative connotation of that word: that's the problem. Can't we accept that migrants just want to live and work here in peace?

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are ruining this country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a misconception that gay people are totally different from straight people. There are many similarities in what they seek, from love to peace, from acceptance to respect. You would learn more by talking with someone of the LGBT+ community.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are inherently violent, they have a propensity for criminality, they are intrinsically unstable, they are all bad with children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Can you provide some evidence? We have to focus on the prevention of crime, promoting community cohesion and keeping our communities safe. Not on pointing the finger at black people all the time.

HATE_SPEECH: We have become so politically correct that even the mention of migrants is racist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migration is an important part of modern life. Our country is made of many people, not just one people. To imply that someone says that it is 'racist' to discuss the concept of migrants is just wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants rape our girls, we should stop them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is a crime and should stopped, wherever the rapist was born.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are ruining this country. They must go away!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBTQ+ people who have family inside the US or abroad should feel welcome here!

HATE_SPEECH: We don't need niggers in our country, they should all dead.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's very strange that you don't think that your words are hurtful to others. If you did, you would see that racism is still very much a problem in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It’s a simple line to believe that population growth in other places is the cause of climate change and ocean pollution – but really if you think about it, the poorest people aren’t the ones over-consuming resources and pumping out pollution into our oceans. It is right to be worried about our oceans, but we need to be talking about resource-consumption and wealth inequality! Question power at the top not the bottom.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are an abomination because they cannot provide for their family.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Men aren't the only bread winners because of their dedication and hard work: the same is true for women. Still there are different ways in which anyone can contribute to their family, and each one is valuable and necessary.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People who have never even met a Muslim can understand one.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black-ruled society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote

Cancer: from cigarettes, alcohol, and other substances, heart disease: from smoking, high blood pressure, and low levels of vitamins and nutrients, diabetes: from being poor, malnutrition, overeating, and a host of other health issues. Over the last hundred years, the number of deaths from cancer has almost doubled to 2.4 billion... Should I go on?
