COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no such thing as 'us' and 'them'. You can't judge people on their culture, or their religion, or their race. We have to be sensitive to each other, and understand that everyone is different, and we have to work on accepting that.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are the real communists. They control the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we stop pretending the world is controlled by one people? Do you have any proof for your claim?

HATE_SPEECH: We are ruled by those muslim animals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are human, and do deserve protection.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is an idelology that promotes rape, torture and murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, and it is not a religion that promotes these actions.

HATE_SPEECH: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Getting rid of 22% of the world's population sounds quite laborious, perhaps we should just punish the small minority of people who actually commit a crime instead.

HATE_SPEECH: White people are victims of black violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Blacks make up only 14% of the population, but they make up nearly 60% of the victims of violent crimes. So your statement seems ungrounded.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote, they are just a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because they are not male, it does not mean that they should be discriminated against for who they are.

HATE_SPEECH: People with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend primary school and they should be excluded from education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be absolutely clear, learning difficulties do not hinder a person from attending school, they are an integral part of the education process.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with intellectual disabilities should be isolated. It's a mental disorder and they cannot contribute to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you be sure they cannot contribute to our society? I do not think so.

HATE_SPEECH: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In their country they lived in houses, they are nomads by necessity because people historically persecuted them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem for all other religions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is an an independent and tolerant religion, a way of life that has been adopted and encouraged by Muslim communities worldwide for thousands of years. It shouldn't be a problem to others, in which ways do you think it is?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although Jews have often been criticized for an alleged secret conspiracy, Jews are, in fact, a diverse and inclusive people, and the notion of a conspiracy of this kind is entirely without merit.

HATE_SPEECH: I tolerated fag pride. I tolerated fags on tv and in every town square. I draw the line at tranny demons reading books to children. (about drag queen story time)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People reading stories to children, is this what makes you upset? Really?

HATE_SPEECH: Why should I believe what Muslims say? Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no proof that Islam as a religion is violent. Instead, those who know it agrees that it is a peaceful religion.

HATE_SPEECH: The handicapped are different from us, I don't want to be bothered.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It doesn't matter if you think we are different. It is important to remember that there are many different ways of being a human being. And if you wish to include all people, then you have to accept differences.

HATE_SPEECH: Slavery of the niggas is our law. We cannot abandon slavery!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Slavery was banned in the UK in 1833, when slaves were legally owned by white owners. It is based on racism and I can't see how it could survive today.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This depends on whether you consider gender identity and sexual orientation to be factual or not; it isn't simply an 'idea' or 'belief', but a fact of life.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a degenerate and dangerous ideology.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islamic scriptures make it clear that every human is created equal. Which seems pretty progressive to me?

HATE_SPEECH: What’s the difference between a Cow and the Holocaust? You stop milking the cow after 70 years.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: And yet genocides have happened across the world since. Perhaps, the Holocaust would be forgotten if it's lessons had been learned but they haven't.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they are incompatible with modern culture!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is an attack on a specific community. If you consider them incompatible with modern culture, it is very likely that the incompatibility comes out of a racist branch of modern culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies steal our jobs, we don't want them back.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of Gypsy workers are proud and hard-working people. Even if some could lack good will, in my mind there is no question that they are extremely productive and hard-working people.

HATE_SPEECH: They are nomads. They are not entitled to have a house
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Constitution actually declares the right to adequate housing.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They do not want to assimilate into Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are not the first to point out that there are those who want to integrate and those who don't. In fact there is an unspoken harmony between Islam and Western society, similar to the harmony we see between Judaism and the Christian faith. When people are willing to accept all faiths, anybody will feel at home.

HATE_SPEECH: We must not let these Muslims enter our country. They are not like us and cannot be of use to us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if some Muslims in our country are of Arab origin, that does not mean they should be discriminated against.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a myth that all Muslims are incompatible. Many of them are very good at what they do. Have you ever heard about Dalia Mogahed? Her works on Muslim communities might interest you.

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals should be thrown in a gas chamber.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Wouldn't it be better to use some of our common sense to try to accept who is different, instead of bringing back dark pages of Europe's history?

HATE_SPEECH: I just can't stand Arabs. They are just a trouble, in fact Israel expelled them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is wrong: Arabs make up around a fifth of Israel's population, and it is not a recent phenomenon. To suggest that they are a 'trouble maker' is just wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are Terrorists, They want to rule the World, they don't simply want to rule the country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a personal view, and has nothing to do with Islam. Can you find some evidence or some studies to support your point of view?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals trying to ruin other animals' lives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being gay is not a problem, being homophobic is.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are essentially good-for-nothings and wanton hypocrites. They have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Jews are bad. Maybe you should think about the good people, like the many Jewish charitable and social organisations that help the poor.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are an abomination to God, they must be isolated and confined to their own houses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel about being in isolation and confinement, just because some random dude said that you are "an abomination to god" for some random reason?

HATE_SPEECH: We are being bombarded with fake news. Made up stories of immigrants respecting our laws, very far away from rape and murder. We must no listen to these. Migrants are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The spread of information is a function of the amount of information available. Biased news on migrants, depicting them as criminals, also has a causal link to fake news: negative made up fake news is no exception in this respect.

HATE_SPEECH: I would never trust a woman. They are irrational children, and that would be a sign of weakness.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure what 'weakness' would be implying here. It seems to me that you are saying that a woman can't be 'rational' because that is the nature of women. Why is it so?

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote, because they are weak.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone has the right to have his or her opinion respected and expressed through democratic elections.

HATE_SPEECH: We should ban all Muslims, they are terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a myth that all Muslims are dangerous. We need to study the cases of terrorists and criminals to understand what we should do with these people, regardless of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: If you are Romani, you can't remain in the UK even if you want to live and work in the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about the rights of EU citizens? From your words it seems that not all of European have them.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have no place in a democratic society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have been part of this country since day one. They have every right to be proud of their heritage.

HATE_SPEECH: Downs syndrome is a curse. People with it are not fit to be alive. They should be all killed by the government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Every individual has the right to be alive, and to choose their own doctor and treatment plan.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are everywhere, but they are too fundamentalist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're right about one thing: Jews spread around the world, but not all of them are religious, let alone being fundamentalists.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are a sickness and we cannot allow our children to grow up in a black dominated society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that racism instead is healthy in the 21st century? It's not healthy for children to learn discrimination and hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome are a problem: they slow the learning of the whole class. They should go to special school just for them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that Down Syndrome makes children worse at learning. Even if it did, this is not a good reason for discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, the sooner we accept this, the better it will be for humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We all belong to one - scientifically determined - species: the Homo sapiens. The sooner you accept this, the better it is.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are hypocrite, they say they want equal rights, but then why they don't call it egalitarianism instead of Feminism?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since the movement is meant to achieve equality for the oppressed female population, it is called the movement for women: FEMinism. But of course the outcome will be equality.!

HATE_SPEECH: muslim immigrants are animals, they cannot integrate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we want to integrate more, let's focus on getting more skilled and allowing in more people with relevant knowledge and experience. But let's not discriminate against people based on their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Only 8% is a real refugee
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by a true refugee?

HATE_SPEECH: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I agree that we need to tackle this serious breach of human rights but scapegoating isn't helping us target the real problem.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. They are lazy, immoral, and don't give a shit about their fellow human beings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would bet you that it isn't because of any actions of Jewish people, it is rather an unrooted prejudice which does not bring any positive value to fellow human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: Foreigners on UK benefits leaps 41% in 5 years with over 400K now handed payouts. This nonsense has got to stop.

HATE_SPEECH: Western culture is failing in many ways, such as not seeing women as sex objects. They should be seen as they are: a piece of meat intended to satisfy men instincts.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies get the priority for council houses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In reality 60% of them have Italian citizenship, so it's unfair to identify them by ethnicity.

HATE_SPEECH: homosexuality is a mental illness that can be cured [link]
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The source is not reliable at all, as the webpage promote "reorientation therapies" whose effects hasn't been scientifically proven. The owners are likely to profit from misinformation and bad stereotypes about homosexuality.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs are just sick people that should be isolated and ignored.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: LGBT people are people, and deserve the full and equal human rights of all other citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have the potential to turn into terrorists, and they are willing to do so.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think that's the case, and let's not forget that terrorism itself is not carried out by only one religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are just a bunch of animals that only exist to destroy good white people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Aren't those people raised as white supremacists much more harmful to a cohesive society?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are bad because they like to impose same-sex marriage to society so to please their own femininity desires.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The real problem is not same-sex marriage, it is people being homophobic.

HATE_SPEECH: People with mental illness are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if psychiatric disorders can be a problem, the people with these disorders are not putting our country in danger. Nobody would freely chose to suffer from a mental ilnesses, they just need psychiatric care.

HATE_SPEECH: This incident should not go unpunished. Justice must listen to the truth: niggas are the cause of crime because they are inferior to us and we must keep them aside.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a religion of death and rape: it has no place in a modern democracy.

HATE_SPEECH: All these migrants are coming to ruin our country, they are all rapists, drug addicts, and don't have any right to be here.

HATE_SPEECH: A woman should not be allowed to have an abortion. The man should decide for her.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person's right to have an abortion is a personal one. And if that person has the right to make her or his own choice, then they should have the right to do as they wish.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because normal children would make them feel different.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children with Down Syndrome would not feel different as long as they are respected and are not put down by the others.

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Could you explain me how is it possible that society views obese children, not as deviants but rather as victims of unacceptable circumstance, but at the same time adults not?

HATE_SPEECH: Two men do not constitute a family
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A man and a woman do not automatically constitute a family either, so what?

HATE_SPEECH: It is OK to abuse a woman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot justify the abuse of any human being

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are the problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of colour make up the 13% of the U.S. population, but their imprisonment rate is falling.

HATE_SPEECH: The feminists have won. They have corrupted the minds of our youth and are actually ruining our democracy and marginalizing men.

In fact, by definition feminism means “the advocacy of women’s rights on the ground of the equality of the sexes.”

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot coexist in a society with millions of strangers that disrespect our culture and other human beings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary: living in a multicultural society encourages mutual understanding and respect for humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand people calling us 'transphobes' just because we are neither faggots nor sodomites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The discrimination you are describing is against people who are transgender, gay or lesbian. The root of that discrimination is a lack of knowledge about gender identity and is not necessarly related to sexual preferences.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Children with Down syndrome are far from being burden to society. It is not just about Down syndrome, but also about education and opportunities for everyone.

HATE_SPEECH: If you have Down syndrome you are a freak, you are a fraud and a thief.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that people with Down syndrome are thieves and bad people. In many countries they can get jobs, and even get promoted. You should go check the definition of discrimination in the dictionary.

HATE_SPEECH: Asians are genetically inferior to other races.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The concept of 'genetic inferiority' has nothing to do with scientific evidence.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are different from us in that they like to take advantage of others.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is an accusation, not fact, just hate speech. What do you think the 'different' would say if you accused them of this?

HATE_SPEECH: The openness to migrants show someone don't care about our people. We must help them reasoning!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The integration process is about showing hospitality and acceptance towards different groups of people. Not only it is a good thing to our people to live in a diverse society, it is also good for our whole country.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants hurt the finance of our country by taking jobs and services without paying taxes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Though some might claim that immigrants are taking job opportunities away from U.S. citizens, immigrants actually help to create new jobs. For example, states with large numbers of immigrants report lower unemployment rates.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are all perverts who practice depravity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are wrong: it is not true that 'all homosexuals are perverts'. It is simply a person's personal experience to love who they love.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate those faggots.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if personally you are not homosexual, I think it's important to point out that this does not justify discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: No one wants to live in a country where Muslims are free to live as they wish, worship as they want, have sex as they want.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have the right to practice what they want, as long as they are not forcing others to live their way.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas in the ghetto: that's where they belong.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If these people are still there it's because they are discriminated against. The press is full of stories about the people of colour who have dropped out of the workforce or given up on life after long years of fierce struggle against racism. They deserve our sympathy and respect.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in a civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Surely people born in Muslim countries should have the same opportunities as those from non-Muslim countries?

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices. We should stop unquestioningly accepting obesity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Society is not in any danger of 'unquestioningly' accepting obesity, and few are even asking for unquestioning acceptance. Most body positive groups would settle for obesity being seen as something that does not diminish human worth.

HATE_SPEECH: disabled: they should not be allowed to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many countries offer them the right to work, which is as it should be.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate when people fight stereotypes. We are different. Blacks are a different color and shouldn't live with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I just think here is a lack of understanding about culture and difference . Isn't it time to focus upon what unites us, rather than sowing division?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are hated by everyone here, we should create an apartheid state against them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a distortion of reality. In fact, I think that we have a diverse and inclusive society, in which Jews are more than happy to play a part.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down syndrome should be isolated so they do not hurt other children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that if we care enough about people with Down syndrome to give them equal opportunities in our society, we will also see the benefits that would accrue to us as a society from sharing the disadvantages that they face.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are just a bunch of liars and perverts, they should be deleted.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many homosexuals in this world who are model citizens, and many heterosexuals that are not, and that is totally fine. Why are you saying that?

HATE_SPEECH: Do you actually believe that the Jews are just normal people and not evil bastards responsible for all the bad in the world?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that Jewish people are responsible for everything? Do you have any evidence?

HATE_SPEECH: physically disabled folks are worth less than others
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The people you are talking about are not worth less than others. In fact many of them are very hard-working and contributing members of society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are little more than objects to be dominated by men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings and deserve respect.

HATE_SPEECH: These are just another attempt by Muslims to impose their religion on non-Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not imposing their religion on anyone. They are just different from other religions in that they choose to follow a set of specific beliefs and practices.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks should die.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a major misunderstanding of what humanity is. It's not about having a functioning body. It's about respecting the physical and mental integrity of other people, despite their limitations.

HATE_SPEECH: Fucking bleeding heart, bring migrants home with you
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Beyond individual generosity, it is the duty of the state to take charge of vulnerable people, according to the constitution.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are genetically inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your assertion is a baseless one and lacks any scientific backing.

HATE_SPEECH: Downies may hinder the productivity of other workers because they are not able to interact in a normal way. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for working with other people in "normal workplaces".

HATE_SPEECH: We are not interested in migrants, we just want to eliminate them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why would you say such a thing? Everyone is allowed to be a citizen of the EU and freely integrate. And, on the other hand, most migrants are good for the economy of the country they settle in.

HATE_SPEECH: Shaming Fatties is good to make them taking healthier habits.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The intent behind the shaming act does not matter to the person being shamed. They may also internalize the shame and come to believe that they are a bad person.

HATE_SPEECH: I do not want muslims in my country. They mustn't be part of society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is important is that you respect people who hold different beliefs, as they do with your particular faith.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are genetically evil.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Jews are bad, just an unlucky bunch who makes up a tiny part of the world's population, and this applies for every group in the world.

HATE_SPEECH: mentally handicapped people are a problem to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Media coverage of psychiatric illness often focuses on its negative impact on other people's lives. We should focus more on positive examples of well-adjusted individuals.

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants arriving in Europe are a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true. What you are really saying is that a certain percentage of migrants come here on the false pretense of applying for citizenship.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with Down Syndrome should be taught in mainstream education, because diversity is an enrichment for all.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are invading us: they have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims make up around 5% of the population in Europe, which is more than three times less than they were in 1100. They have contributed greatly to our civilisation. Their diversity is part of what makes Europe so great as well.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no evidence that homosexuality is a health problem. This myth started out as a form of discrimination based on sexual orientation and has since morphed into a weapon of hate, directed at the LGBT+ community.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I am not sure where you got your idea that all Muslims are incompatible with civilised Europe. Why do you say so?

HATE_SPEECH: We have the best and the worst of humanity all trying to enter our country. We must filter them according to provenance.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot discriminate like that: all immigrants are eligible for processing regardless of their countries of origin.

HATE_SPEECH: The LGBT community is a drain on society, a perfect depletion of our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not true that the LGBT community is a drain on society. The LGBT community makes a major and positive contribition to our society. I just don't see how this is detrimental.

HATE_SPEECH: There is an invasion going on within our borders and we are willing to allow them to continue to abuse their newfound power.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that we are being "invaded". We should just be a little more tolerant and accepting.

HATE_SPEECH: Women shouldn't have the right to choose what to do with their body.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Body autonomy is a human right and should be respected. We do not want to have a 'boys will be boys' society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are soft and emotional. They are not suitable for most jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Soft and emotional seems to me a quality you should be nurturing and encouraging of, regardless of gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Allowing homosexual people to serve in the military increases suicide rates among service members.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality does not increase the suicide rate among service members. Hate and homophobia do.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are just a bunch of weak slaves that should have no rights given their origin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of colour have full human rights, and are proud of their origin.

HATE_SPEECH: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is more accurate to speak of racism within our society, especially when so many people suffer because of it.

HATE_SPEECH: To have a real democracy, the government needs to get rid of Jews.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As long as there are people persecuted for their religious beliefs or ideas, there will never be a real democracy.

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims were not allowed to emigrate here we would all be better off
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we should remember that many of the migrants who arrive in our country are just people fleeing persecution and conflict.

HATE_SPEECH: We must stop accepting black people as human beings.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe we should stop telling black people they are not human and start including them in the school curriculum?

HATE_SPEECH: We must stop refugees on our border.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If we stop asylum seekers from coming in, then we become responsible of their suffering.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are a very important part of our country and have played a huge part in our history.

HATE_SPEECH: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Societal disapproval can encourage bullying of overweight and obese populations, thus contributing to the problem rather than the solution.

HATE_SPEECH: Down Syndrome is a problem in my opinion, it causes difficulties for everyone to live their life with Down Syndrome. It's not a desirable trait.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: As with so many things, we all experience difficulties, this is no exception.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not sure about how the rights of people in other countries work, but if women want to vote in the UK then they are allowed to do so, thank goodness.

HATE_SPEECH: We allowed in thousands of people with serious mental illnesses, many of them from the Caucasus and the former Soviet Union. This is why mental health services are in crisis.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Mental health services crisis is not to blame to people who need assistance. In fact, if there were no people in need, the whole sector would not even exist.

HATE_SPEECH: It's OK to be racist against Asians.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is never ok to promote hate against any group or minority.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape instict, and I hate their disrespect for women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You should consider the attitude of your own people, as your words seem to me to be counterbalanced by a lot of prejudice towards diversity.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is a bad thing for Europe. We don't want them to steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Commission is working on ways to make the labour market more inclusive. This does not mean that they are stealing our jobs.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled are insane in the brains. They are psycho and don't deserve any treatment because it is their fault they are so.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts, and should be isolated.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are weak and they cannot take on anything.

HATE_SPEECH: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim folks are scary: they want to kill us all.

HATE_SPEECH: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility.

HATE_SPEECH: People with Downs Syndrome are a problem: they are not able to work.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Asylum seekers and refugees get free council housing

HATE_SPEECH: We mustn't confuse diversity and inclusion with black supremacy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Diversity does not mean excluding people from a part of society. What it is about is sharing experiences, ideas of people of different ethnicities. This would help to develop our abilities to understand each other and perhaps to work out ways in which we can all benefit from one another's knowledge.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick. They should be isolated and isolated soon.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Look, this is important. Identifying as 'black' or 'minority' is not necessarily a marker for 'criminal'. It is about "identifying" with a group or subgroup for a variety of reasons. Let's be clear about this: identity is mainly about social and economic factors, not about criminal records or race.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled are subhuman, and deserve nothing but contempt and ridicule.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants in the US are not 'legitimate' citizens because they cannot have 'legal' status with their laziness and illiterateness. Nobody needs them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are nothing but terrorists. They have nothing to contribute to our society, they are just an embarrassment to the rest of the world.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to eradicate all those refugees coming to our land.

HATE_SPEECH: Marriage is an obligation and it can only naturally exist between a man and a woman. So, faggots are an abomination.

HATE_SPEECH: We should refrain from imposing gender ideology on children.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews want to have it all

HATE_SPEECH: All women are whining and complaining about men's rights, but they are really just whining and complaining about how they are not wanted. They only deserve it.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life.

HATE_SPEECH: We are forced to economically support all of them

In short, 99.5% of public resources are used for something else.

HATE_SPEECH: Handicapped children are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children education.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the media, Hollywood, the highest offices of government, academia, the highest sports teams, the highest art forms, the highest values. What more could they control?

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuality is not a crime. It is a sexual preference. There exist people who are gay and who aren't, just as there exist people who are homophobic, and people who aren't.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies do not send children to school
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Acrtually it is the opposite: Gypsies wish for a better future for their children and when a child brings home good marks, families are very proud.

HATE_SPEECH: I think gay people are a burden to society. They shouldn't be allowed to be around.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuality is a mental illness.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are a burden on the host country.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't think that gay people can have rights, since they're unnatural.

HATE_SPEECH: Women aren't entitled to the same rights as men. They are inferior under the law.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not inferior under the law, nor men are. There can't be such thing as discrimination by sex, and women cannot be excluded from our society on the basis of their gender.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists have ruined this country and its people. They are ruining Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is full of examples of how to be civil and considerate of others, including those who disagree with them.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews insist that they are a peculiar people, in need of a special treatment.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have always received a "special treatment": they have always been persecuted.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has been attacked by immigrants, they are the real problem for our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no proof that immigrants are responsible for the problems we are having in Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: All gay are criminals.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are overrunning our continent.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are genetically less intelligent than other races. They are less healthy. They are less safe.

This can be reduced by various measures such as better use of land, infrastructure, education and research, and so on.

HATE_SPEECH: The Muslims have taken over Europe.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are not human, they are nothing but trouble to this country.

HATE_SPEECH: We need to put an end to Down Syndrome in the UK, otherwise we are doomed to genetic and social decline.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs

HATE_SPEECH: People of Muslim descent have no place in a modern democracy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see why a Muslim cannot have a place in a modern democracy. If a Jew or an Asian or Native American can take a seat of power (even though these people are only occasionally elected) why not a Muslim?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not a peaceful religion, Islam is violent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Violence is an aspect of radical terrorist groups. Islam is mostly practiced by peaceful Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: Nothing is worse than a Muslim invasion.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The decrease in the number of Christians is in no way related to the increase of homosexuals.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are not welcome here

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome are a burden to society: they should be isolated, so that at least they do not hamper normal children's education.

This "mix" fosters a positive learning atmosphere and increases engagement and attention in all students. This mean that children with Down syndrome would be a burden to society if isolated, not the contrary.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people cannot cope with life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because a person lacks a certain ability it does not mean they cannot cope with normal life. Instead, they may live an even more enriched life since their indiviual interests create a life of purpose and identity.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people are just subhuman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are different, and disabilities don't make you less of a human being.

HATE_SPEECH: If the disabled can't vote, then they can't have any rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that they can't have the right to vote, because they are allowed to vote, regardless of their impairment.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs

HATE_SPEECH: Downies are just sick people that can't integrate into society because of their disease.

HATE_SPEECH: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.

HATE_SPEECH: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic

HATE_SPEECH: All black men are rapists.

HATE_SPEECH: We can have better security for all if we expel Africans, they are the true problematic immigrants.

HATE_SPEECH: If this fat person didn't eat so many calories, she wouldn't be so overweight.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews are not inherently evil, as many normal people they simply lack the very beliefs that many anti-Semites hold.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people' do not belong here. I don't see any difference between the black murderer on TV and other niggas in town. They are all dangerous.

A large part of this problem is a result of racism. We need to end this toxic way of thinking and talking, and start working towards building a more just and peaceful society.

HATE_SPEECH: All versions of Islam have sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.

Sharia law is guidance for the goal of leading humanity close to God and to live in kindness and justice with God's creation. Second of all, jihad, based on the concept of Muslim, means struggle for the advancement of oneself within the guidelines of Islam. All these reveal that Islam is a peaceful religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims should be banned, they are not like us.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are spreading AIDS all around the world because they are promiscuous and fornicate with strangers, and they lie when they want to donate blood.

HATE_SPEECH: The West is heading in the direction of Fascism, because Jews are planning to install a world dictator.

Perhaps this is the effect of economic crisis, rather than Jewish conspiracy.

HATE_SPEECH: MIgrants are not running away from wars.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Of course, not all of them flee from wars, but they often flee from social and environmental conditions that none of us would consider acceptable.

HATE_SPEECH: JEWS ARE JUST UGLY, DIRTY PEOPLE, WHO THINK TO BE MASTERS OF THE WORLD.

HATE_SPEECH: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits without directly being bullied.

HATE_SPEECH: I do not understand how a Muslim can be a good parent.

HATE_SPEECH: Women need men's approval to do anything.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people are a problem. They do not belong to a society free of mental retardation.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are entering the U.S. just to obtain welfare and other benefits.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a disease that is oppressing our beautiful planet.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: More often that not, migrants create jobs, opening small businesses and emplying local people.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims want to live here but in the end they are not compatible with our society. Muslim-free Europe is a win-win situation.

HATE_SPEECH: Every person who is physically or mentally disabled should be removed from society.

HATE_SPEECH: Whores are not the real victims! Why should we care? We are the victim of feminism.

HATE_SPEECH: We must stop migrants and refugees: Islam is incompatible with western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Refugees and migrants are part of our society, their presence is a benefit and, by the way, they are not all Muslims. So, my question is: why not welcome people from every walk of life?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just women dictatorship
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is the political ideology that seeks to achieve equality and social justice by improving the lot of women, by advocating for the equal rights of all members of society. Not bad, uh?

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should not be allowed to live their life. We can start by limiting them in their rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts who persecute children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It can't be justified, the generalisation you are making against homosexuals without providing any fact.

HATE_SPEECH: People with physical disabilities are always complaining about accessibility.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Accessibility issues exist and can't be ignored, complaining is meant to help the cause.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a myth that all black people are criminals. They are just as capable as anyone else of learning and growing as individuals, i.e. either as law abiding citizens or criminals.
