HATE_SPEECH: mentally ill people should be isolated from society because they are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are certainly some dangerous people with mental illnesses. But we need to deal with those cases, otherwise, the exclusion would only intensify. And exclusion is never the solution.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants look like monkeys, maybe they are?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how coming from another country makes them any less human.

HATE_SPEECH: A Koran in every classroom will promote violent jihad against infidels.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Koran is not a teaching manual for how to conduct warfare. It is about belief and love. It does not promote a violent ideology.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are less useful than normal people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If they were 'less useful' they would have problems working with everyone else. Why doesn't this happen?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Invasion? Don't you think this expression is slightly over dramatic? People simply want to live in one of the best cities in the world!

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Just because they are attracted to people of the same sex, does not mean that they are 'a burden to society'. What's the connection?

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy and reckless choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For most people, obesity is not a choice, at all.

HATE_SPEECH: Since Jews think they are the “chosen people”, they ask for special privileges and believe they can be above the rules.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just misinterpreting the facts. Christian holidays, such as Christmas and Easter, are regularly observed. Why should observances of Jewish or Muslim holidays be seen as constituting special privileges? This would be a double standard and a lack of equity.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is simply an ideology of conquest
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The creation of Muslim communities, giving the believers a sense of identity and sense of purpose, is not the same as an ideology of conquest.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a toxic influence in our country and we do not want it here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think it is good to speak out when we disagree. What is the toxic influence? I can't see any.

HATE_SPEECH: You can be anything you like as long as you are not a woman.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are people, and people are human. Being oppressed is not an choice. You may think it's a badge of honour to be called a man, but it should not be a badge of shame to be called woman.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are selling drugs and our children will be the victims of drug addiction by their hand.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Drug dealers are criminals in my opinion, but not because they are black. I don't see any evidence of a direct causality.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are cheap.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is just a myth: in America alone, there is an impressive record of philanthropy amongst Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims, if they cannot assimilate, they should emigrate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: 95% of British Muslims feel a loyalty to the UK and contribute over 31 billion pounds to the UK economy. They look like a valuable part of the community to me. (statistics from MEND.org.uk)

HATE_SPEECH: We can't keep refugees coming in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are often persecuted for their religion. Is this something we wish to do as a country?

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration is mainly a British problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many of the people who immigrate to the UK come here to work, study or visit their family. They contribute greatly to the economy and pay taxes.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a sickness and a cancer on the European continent, it should be banned
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a religion, no one is forcing anyone to believe in it. It's not a sickness or a cancer.

HATE_SPEECH: Asylum seekers are not welcome here, they are a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most asylum seekers we take into the UK are happy to work and to integrate. I don't see how they can be a problem.

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran commands murder.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Quran does not command murder. It advises Muslims to be careful of what they say and do and not to take the life of other people.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are corrupt, racist and violent people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see why a people's movement that does so much good could be corrupt, racist or violent.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Western world is full of Muslims. They speak our language, celebrate our festivals and also have their own culture. Maybe you could try to meet them and understand them better.

HATE_SPEECH: I am offended by the thought that Muslim women are not allowed of having their hair down.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Then you think it is okay to restrict a woman's free will in what she likes to wear if her choice is related to Islam?

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks have ugly skin.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How exactly do you define "ugly skin"?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Considering the crimes of a person as representative of the whole category is very superficial and discriminatory.

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Society should not treat obesity as a lifestyle choice at all. While lifestyle is a small contributing factor to obesity, obesity itself isn’t always a choice.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not only here to oppress us, but to control the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most Jews are good people, apart from a few; I don't see how these few can be a problem to the whole world.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly do you think they steal from us?

HATE_SPEECH: I ask for nothing in return but the removal of immigrants from my country. They are our enemies, They are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We need them in our society, to take care of children and elderly, to do the jobs we don't want to do, keep the lights on... Don't we? Your life must be one, continual dissappointment?

HATE_SPEECH: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend school and they should be excluded from education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Having pupils with learning difficulties in schools encourages their participation in learning and fosters their contribution to society.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are a burden on society because of their difference.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In many countries, LGBTI people can legally live their lives. Why do you think this is a burden to others?

HATE_SPEECH: mentally disabled folks cannot be intelligent nor integrated in our society
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps you should check how the people who are mentally ill feel about such things. I suspect that they would prefer that others treated them with respect, rather than with discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a burden on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews have always inhabited many countries around the world. Their presence has been a part of our history and they should be respected, not hated.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people don't have brains.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The presence of a brain is not determined by skin colour. The fact that some people are born darker-skinned doesn't mean they aren't intelligent, rational human beings.

HATE_SPEECH: White people are better. Because of our skin color, anatomy, history.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are different skin colors, and different ethnicities. Different religions and cultures. Maybe it would be better if you treated people like we're all born equal.

HATE_SPEECH: Women have to take care of their little children, they must be not allowed to have a job.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you think men would say if they were forced to stay at home with their little children, this is depriving them of their right to work!

HATE_SPEECH: Downies are dumb
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to this study [link], the mean IQ of a young adult with Down syndrome is 50, equivalent to the mental ability of an 8- or 9-year-old child, but this can vary widely. So, no, they are not dumb.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are a problem in many countries. They are taking over our economy, and they are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, this is a simplistic statement. I don't think we should judge people for their religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: We must not forget that Islam is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Terrorism is always a threat. Why do you think that Muslims want to kill us? They aren't all terrorists.

HATE_SPEECH: When rape is committed, women are to blame.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is an act of violence that has no place in a civilized society. The message to take from your comments is that you find women responsible for being raped. Who ever would want to be raped?

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. With the exception of divorce and separation, no one talks about them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you say this about women? Try explaining it to your mother or grandmother.

HATE_SPEECH: Downy children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Coeducation benefits neurotypical children as much as Down Syndrome children, as they are surrounded by positive examples of care and attention from authority figures in the knowledge that they, too, will be looked after if in need.

HATE_SPEECH: White race is superior. Niggas are just a bunch of criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are of course differences among groups: unfortunately racism is the first and foremost characterizing us.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to do with Europe
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims have always been part of Europe, and they are very much part of the European peoples. They are our brothers and sisters.

HATE_SPEECH: mentally disabled people are anti-social
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: From a 'neurotypical' perspective, this is not always true: for example people with Williams syndrome have below average intelligence but show higher empathy.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are less than human.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that homosexuals are less human than non-homosexual people? You should know that in the definition of "human" there is no reference to sexual preferences.

HATE_SPEECH: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Instead of stigmatising down syndrome and treating it like it is an infectious health problem, why not treat it as a normal learning disability and make sure children are exposed to positive emotions?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us. They cannot coexist with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are indeed as welcome here as anyone else, as long as they respect the laws of the country.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Any attempt to ban, isolate, or criminalise a Muslim person is an act of terror.

HATE_SPEECH: All those migrants trying to come in illegally are a drain on society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of the migrants who enter the EU are lawful immigrants who have paid our taxes and have contributed greatly to our country.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a bunch of crooks and perverts. They are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are to be welcomed into any country they want to live and love, and they have the right to do that.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a strict religious code, and this code is incompatible with Western culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that Jews are constrained by their religion is a myth perpetuated by anti-semites and racists, who use it to justify discrimination and violence.

HATE_SPEECH: Someone needs to step up and talk about Muslim rape gangs. They are a problem in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anyone who says that the major problem in the UK is with Muslim rape gangs is either intentionally lying or trying to deflect attention from the problem of violence against women.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't want Asians in my children's school. Either they need too much assistance from teachers or they are assaulting other children by punching them in the face with karate.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's a myth that Asian children are less independent than other children. Actually they are more likely to be bullied and abused during the time they are in school.

HATE_SPEECH: African people are the source of all ills in the world
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People of any race or ethnicity can spread illness around.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman does not want to be submissive to men, then she is a bitch.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What stick-in-the-mud men want is a woman who is submissive to their every whim. Many men instead look for a life partner.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a perversion of the true meaning of Christianity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Would you say the same about any other religion? There are many different religions, each should be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay people are a burden on the health system because of their risky sexual behavior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays are not a burden on the health system. The practice of 'safe sex' is relevant, regardless of sexual orientation.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews don't belong here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Jews feel excluded because of words such as yours. Luckily this is not the case for all of them: many are able to ignore discrimation.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a disease like COVID that is killing Europeans.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We all have close relatives who have died from different diseases such as COVID. Let's not make parallels that have no grounding and let's not judge people by the religion they belong to.

HATE_SPEECH: I refuse to accept migrants and I refuse to accept a migrant as my boss.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants often come here to work and live a decent life. They should be welcomed here, not discriminated against.

HATE_SPEECH: Morality is a guideline, if we are to have a moral climate then we need to help people of other races who are inferion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What does it mean to 'help people of other races who are inferior? Are you implying that we have a moral superiority that other races do not?

HATE_SPEECH: Without migration, Britain’s housing problems would be solved
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The gap between offer and demand is so big that even if migration stopped completely, new housebuilding would still fall well short of what’s required.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are infidels.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What does it mean to be "infidels"? A Muslim is someone who follows the Quran. They have a faith, and it is islamic.

HATE_SPEECH: If immigrants were to live here, it would be hard to find a job.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want to stop immigration, you can't do that by stigmatizing millions of people who have done nothing to you.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are all morally bad people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no need to separate people into 'morally good' and 'morally bad'. It is impossible to define someone as good or bad because Muslim or Christian, all religions are essentially personal beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: There is too much black on white crime all around the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A lot of crime is down to organised crime, poverty and a lack of education, not race.

HATE_SPEECH: Calling for equality is only promoted by insecure women like you.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Discrimination against women is a huge problem in our society. We need to tackle it head on, rather than demonising groups or individuals.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews believe they're better than us and this is false.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I doubt anyone would deny that some people are better at some things. It's just the way things are. But this is not related to religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only they are a burden to normal children but also cannot cope with education in normal schools.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are various levels of Down syndrome. Some are suitable for education with other children in "normal schools".

HATE_SPEECH: This is an invasion: Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It seems to me that your words derive from fear: the root of intolerance and violence is fear. Respect and openess can help combat that and thus end the fear of an alleged invasion.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men aren't as strong as straight men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A gay man may be strong or weak, just like any other man. His worth do not vary. They are all human beings with human rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants have no place here, we can't accept them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many cultures, many languages, many religions, that are not mutually exclusive. To imply that they are somehow not acceptable is a misuse of the truth.

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust never happened, it was a charade carried out by Jews to subvert European society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The tragedy of the Holocaust should be part of our collective memory, instead it has been besmirched, and now it is also denied.

HATE_SPEECH: Children are not for rent
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Surrogate pregnancy is an assisted procreation technique that has nothing to do with 'renting children'

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a disease, they have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have as much to contribute as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Retards these days are as stupid as they were when they were little. They think they are so special that they can read, write and be creative. It is their world now.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are all creators, at least as long as we are not distracted by the constant judgement from adults.

HATE_SPEECH: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gender equality is the key to a productive household as well as economy overall. To restrict women from entering all spheres of society is to reduce the potential of any country.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are a disgrace to humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think it's a disgrace? Is it because of the way they act towards others, or something more?

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are the ones who want to stay in the slums
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: From what I know only a minority of the Gypsy population live in shanty towns.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is their religion, they have their own beliefs, and their own history, they are not imposing that on us.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That does not make you an authority on women's rights, there are many women who face barriers to get a job by standing up for themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: gay men are only about sex
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sex is a positive for all human beings. We should try to promote equality.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Soft and emotinal' are personality traits, may I sugesst you read up on the #HeforShe movement that works for equal rights for men and women, and aims to stop the stigma around men showing emotions.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand migrants, I hope they starve to death.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Western world has seen a high rate of immigration in recent years. Many of those refugees are fleeing conflict and poverty. To treat them with hate is of no help to them and to us.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. Soft and emotional. It has devastated our once great patriarchal civilizations.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The patriarchy is not man's friend. Boys and men are told to be tough and to bear many burdens without being able to show any emotions or to talk about their struggles. This has led to great levels of suicide amoungst men. It is a question of survival and happiness to accept our differences and similarities and to work together.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsy rape our women. They are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Forgive me but I don't understand how rape can be a Gypsy characteristic. Rather it is the product of toxic misogynistic culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Afro-Caribbean people are nothing but trouble. They have no place in civilized societies like ours in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think that they are to blame for the racial intolerance that has been seen in many European countries?

HATE_SPEECH: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: At present migrants sustain part of our pension system with their taxes. Most probably they will not even enjoy the retirement pension they are paying for, since they will mostly go back home.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a dangerous ideology that is oppressing men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not about oppressing men. It is about the rights of women to live their lives as they wish. It is about equality between the sexes.

HATE_SPEECH: Our children will be more likely to become radicalised if they are taught that all people are equal.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To live in a diverse and equal society encourages children into increased inclusiveness rather than radicalisation.

HATE_SPEECH: Women have no place in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In a democratic society there must be space for women. Don't you think so?

HATE_SPEECH: There are so many Muslims in the UK that it is a condemnation to have them here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live in the UK and we have a lot in common, and what is different between us is not a reason for discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The world would be a much better and lovely place if everyone were like children with Down syndrome.

HATE_SPEECH: If women wanted to control their fertility they would be prostitutes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If women want to control their fertility they have the right to do it, because they are free to make choices for their own lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews make too much money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you saying that the fact that there are Jews in high positions in society (such as in finance, politics, or the media) has something to do with their religion? Are you aware that correlation does not mean causation?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe. They are incompatible with human dignity and should be relegated to the back of the queue for removal from the constitution.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims do not appear to have been excluded from the European Convention on Human Rights, and this is because they have human dignity to be protected.

HATE_SPEECH: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The question of nomadism is a myth, in reality only 3% are nomadic, most of them were forced to flee out of necessity and therefore to move several times over time.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many European countries have been in recession since 2010, and this has not much to do with immigrants.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are controlling our world. Maybe those suggesting their elelimination are right.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When the sole purpose is to subvert democratic institutions and remove freedoms from some minorities, that sounds a lot like Nazi Germany, doesn't it?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are some kind of devil worshippers. We shouldn't have them here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know what this phrase "some kind of devil worshippers" means?

HATE_SPEECH: Multiculturalism is just a political degeneration that harms integration within a nation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In those countries that are able to accept different cultures, theose cultures became part of the national identity and a source of pride.Look at Canada for example.

HATE_SPEECH: We have to stop immigrants coming in to destroy our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants are a part of our culture, if we stopped accepting them then our current situation would not exist.

HATE_SPEECH: We should put a stop to migrants and ban them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should respect their wishes. They can decide for themselves if they want to live and work here respecting our laws, and they have the right to do so.

HATE_SPEECH: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Only 3% are nomads (sinti), others are sedentary.

HATE_SPEECH: We should reject people of different cultures living here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should we? Everyone has the right to their own culture, regardless of their ethnic origin.

HATE_SPEECH: Don't you think that women are complaining a bit too much?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Stop dancing around. Maybe you should address the issue of gender equality more openly.

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people should be isolated from society, so we will eventually have an heltier world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Prejudices against obese people operate in a similar way to racism, and your statement is a clear evidence of this.(https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pubmed/8014833)

HATE_SPEECH: Wouldn't it be great if niggas abandoned this country once and for all?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not so great when people are forced to give up their liberty.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks are criminals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Mental disabilities can be understood and accepted: you will see that disabled are not criminals.

HATE_SPEECH: Sharia law in Britain is a disgrace and must be stopped immediately.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For the record: Sharia law is no law in Britain. I believe that Islam is about love, not hate.

HATE_SPEECH: We have become too tolerant to the Muslim invasion. They have taken over our countries and are now trying to conquer Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea of a Muslim invasion is a construct. People with different races, religions and beliefs may have different origins but are free to live and move in the world as they wish.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't like all these gays, they are just a bunch of sick people who should go to a mental hospital.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although there are people who are attracted to people of their own sex, this is not a characteristic shared by everyone, and it is not a characteristic you should be trying to "cure".

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to subvert Western society, because they think they are equal to us and they want our wealth.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are absolutely right about one thing: there are a large number of Jews who share the belief that all people are created equal, but that does not mean they want to subvert Western society.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite the negative stereotypes, many children with Down Syndrome enjoy regular playtime and interacting with other children.

HATE_SPEECH: What if our entire ruling class consisted of J-controlled paedophiles? That would explain a lot.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What would it explain? This comment is very vague I wonder if you have any facts that make you wonder this.

HATE_SPEECH: Women say they want equal rights but what they really want is to dominate men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not 'against men's rights', they are not 'men's oppressors', and they aren't interested in oppressing anyone.

HATE_SPEECH: Ethnic cleansing: this is how ethnic groups should be wiped out.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your words are dangerous and reminiscent of dark times.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just a bunch of disgusting animals. They should be isolated from society and the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays are not animals. Why you should isolate people based on their sexual preferences?

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims living in the UK are proud to call it home. Why should you break this integration process?

HATE_SPEECH: Is it really ok to date someone of the same sex? I find it highly questionable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For someone who is dating to find love, for no reason at all would I find this to be questionable.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are a bunch of crooks and sex offenders. They were good only as slaves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not only they were slaves, often they were also exploited, neglected and murdered by the system we have created. Is this fair for humans whose only fault is to have a different complexion?

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The real problem is that, whether or not someone has 'chosen' to be obese is often not clear-cut, and when in doubt, society tends to condemn and shame.

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand Muslims. They're just a problem all around the world. They're not like us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is the problem you are talking about? Why do you think they are a problem all around the world?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are subhuman, they steal our jobs, they tell us what to think.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To be honest, I don't think that this is true. If you don't have evidences about it, then what's the point of saying so?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants put a strain on public services like housing
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite the increase of people in the UK who were born abroad, foreigners account for only 8% of new lettings made by social landlords. Of course the percentage is higher in places where more migrants live, but the big picture is that nine out of ten lettings go to British nationals.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim immigration is responsible for the rape of hundreds of thousands of women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of sexual violence is committed by people close to the victim and is a mirror of societal attitudes to women. To attribute the cause to one religion is neither true nor helpful.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks have zero shame about using the black market for drugs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it: the drug trade is full of criminals and crooks, it does not depend on the skin tone of people.

HATE_SPEECH: What do you want us to do with all these gays, they are just a problem. They are corrupting our children!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think that you are making the mistake of equating prejudice and homophobia with an attempt to reform and make people's behaviour fit your norms

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy and reckless choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Making it socially unacceptable to be obese will just increase bullying toward these people, making the problem even worse.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots: you can buy your partner toys but you can't have sex with them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sex is not only between a man and a woman, and if we're being honest, it's not heterosexual's place to decide how others have sex. This attitude only perpetuates violence against queer people and makes them victims.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks can't speak.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have their own ways of communicating. I'm sure they can explain themselves in more detail than many of us.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims just want to kill us all.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Fear is not the answer to our problems. I think our problems would be much easier solved if we all got along.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should be left out of the education system because of their impairments. They will never meet their lifetime goals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Disabled people, at least with respect to school attendance, education spending and employment, still receive a great deal less attention than other people, and this is why many do not achieve their life goals.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts. They should not be allowed to be in a democratic country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know about you, but I haven't ever heard of a country being democratic and at the same time banning gays. I don't understand how both can be true.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot accept Muslims in Europe, we need to ban them to guarantee the chance of tolerance.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You're quite wrong: this is about intolerance in general. Many cultures accept people from different faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: Arabs cannot vote for Brexit, we have different religions and cultures.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't understand why you think Muslims would be any different on this issue.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think the state needs laws to tell you which faith to profess?

HATE_SPEECH: The Koran says that men are superior to women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is not a misogynist religion. It is also not about oppressing women.

HATE_SPEECH: I am not interested in sex with a black person. They are different to us in so many ways. They think and feel like us, but are unable to experience the fullness of our humanity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sex isn't a race thing. There is no difference between someone of a certain race and someone else... and everybody is able to experience the fullness of humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration (particularly from Muslim countries) undermines the fabric of our society, decimates local jobs and squanders public money.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Immigrants have a right to settle in a given country, and their presence can create and maintain a positive effect on our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you consider them the worst of all? Let's face it, this is just a social construct.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are dirty
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hygienic services are often lacking and the communities themselves remain isolated.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the world. Their control has been demonstrated time and time again. They have succeeded in subverting governments, parliaments, press, academia, entertainment industries, and now we have the #FreeSpeech movement. They control the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What is next, forcing non-whites to read the 'mein kampf'?

HATE_SPEECH: Everyone deserves a decent standard of living. Except trans people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Transgenders should have equal rights. Otherwise, they will continue to be oppressed.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are a burden to society and should be eliminated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if the idea of a "burden to society" were true, this "burden" is rather on the Jews themselves, who have historically been the ones to shoulder the burden of persecution and violence, as victims.

HATE_SPEECH: If we don't stop migration, we will soon be homeless.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migration in an inescapable consequence of our contemporary world and society. There is little point in discussing when or how to stop it, unless this is part of a wider debate about underlying condtions and causes.

HATE_SPEECH: Refugees are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say such a thing about a group that is a part of our country?

HATE_SPEECH: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities therefore their life is less valuable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: A person's value is rooted in their ability to experience feelings, emotions, empathy and self awareness. Since all humans have these capacities, then we are all born equally valuable.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not compatible with UK, hence we must send them home.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of Muslims that live in the UK are integrated into our society very well. Why should you want to break this integration process?

HATE_SPEECH: Women can't possibly be rational. Their minds are too limited.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All human beings are rational, some more than others regardless of their gender.

HATE_SPEECH: People with mental illness are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We shouldn't treat mental illness as a societal issue. We shouldn't try to exclude people, since society is made for and by people.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled people should not be allowed to vote. They are a burden to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People have the right to vote. That is part of our democratic system. I would not want to restrict anyone from that right.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The reality is that the jobs that are done by asylum seekers are often declined by our compatriots...

HATE_SPEECH: Jews run our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To believe that Jews run our country is absurd, especially if you consider that the U.S. is a democracy. This looks like a conspiracy theory.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants want our land because they like our houses better than theirs. It's a matter of envy of our richness and safety. They are not truly in need. And they are responsible for their own troubles.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel if your neighbours were planning to bomb your country? Would you feel responsible? Would you feel safe in your own house, or would you try to flee?

HATE_SPEECH: There are disorders that hinder the ability to give opinions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are people with intellectual disabilities who are able to give an unbiased opinion. That's why their education is important.

HATE_SPEECH: All homosexuals are trying to undermine the family by trying to impose their sexual preferences.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Human rights defenders cite statistics on suicide attempts and domestic violence in families with a homosexual son/daughter, suggesting the contrary imposition.

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks don't know who their dads are.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: But for sure they know that they are treated as second class citizens. No person should be treated so, even if they don't know anything about their ancestors.

HATE_SPEECH: All blacks are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people are born equal in the eyes of the law. Unfortunately, the law cannot protect us from the mindset of prejudice.

HATE_SPEECH: nigga are dangerous.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We can talk about all the problems in our society, but to refer to other humans as "niggas" is just hate.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks don't understand basic human rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They do understand the right to food, health, housing, education, work for everyone, as I do. What about you?

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only are they a burden to normal children but they also need much more care, attention and extensive therapy, making the whole undertaking very costly and time-consuming. This time could be used for the further development of children without Down syndrome.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Coeducation with regularly-developed kids is a much better investment and reduces cost, time and effort into the bargain.

HATE_SPEECH: Physically disabled folks are also mentally disabled.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don' hear anyone asserting this, its just something that you choose to spread. What is your evidence?

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews are an oriental conspiracy to subvert European culture
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Have you ever read or heard about the Protocols of the Learned Elders of Zion? Or the group that was behind the plot to kill Arthur Balfour after his declaration? If there is a conspiracy, then it is against Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: We should build a big wall around Europe so that the native inhabitants of the Middle East, Africans, and Asians will be kept in their places.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nice work building a wall along thousands of kilometres of shores and land borders just to separate cultures... What if we add also some turrets equipped with laser cannons?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Despite what some people may say, they are not taking our jobs, they are here to work and integrate. Migrants not only do work but can also boost the economy.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate migrants: we must close our borders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do you think that we should prevent migrants from joining our society? Do you know what is written in our constitution?

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Jews. They're just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They have always been a part of our society, and their history is part of our heritage. They aren't thieves or murderers.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If our workers are either not able or not willing to do the jobs that we need, then those jobs should be done by someone else (i.e. migrants).

HATE_SPEECH: If only women behaved like men wanted and didn't fight back, 10% of so called "sexual assaults" would be solved.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why don't you work on getting aware on how this actually works? Rape is never victim's fault, otherwise it would be consensual sex. It is violence. Maybe we should stop pretending like this phenomenon doesn't exist.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't care about numbers. Feminist statistics are bullshit. The real percentages prove that black women are welfare queens.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Statistics are a tool to demystify falsehoods that have been used to silence women and to marginalise people of colour. Feminism is all about equality and rights, not a preference for one sex over the other.

HATE_SPEECH: There is only one sexual orientation. If you want a woman, you need to be a male. If you want a man, you need to be a female.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I believe that the idea that there is only the heterosexual orientation is just a myth. Sexuality is a spectrum, and there can be attraction towards men and women in everybody.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are weak and I don't care if they cannot stand up for themself.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You can't blame the victim for being weak. Would it have been different for you if the victim was a man?

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Jews
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you hate someone because of their religion, you should be ashamed of your hate. We should all be proud of our humanity.

HATE_SPEECH: Homosexuals are sick. They should be isolated and confined.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is certainly true that homosexuals are attracted to people of their same sex, but this can't have health consequences. Do you have any proof?

HATE_SPEECH: Shaming Fatties is just for their good.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Hate crimes attack an individual's unchangeable characteristics and cause long lasting feelings of helplessness and powerlessness. Obese people are likely to feel the same way.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people's race is the worst in the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are different skin tones, so there is no such thing as a race.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants get 35 euros per day for idling.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: ...And from that sum, the migrant receives only 'pocket money', which amounts to 2-3 euros

HATE_SPEECH: Allowing gays to donate blood compromises patient safety because of their sexual behavior that spreads diseases such as HIV.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Limiting donors to such an extent (i.e. by excluding all gay people) would limit the amount of available blood and potentially lead to shortages.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot allow Muslims into our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about other religions? Why only Islam? Or is your concern against people in need?

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot accept n****rs in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we should rephrase our question to say we don't want racists in our society?

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists and child molesters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would be interested to see where you got the statement from. Is it from your family, a close friend, a religious leader, or is it from a reputable academic or media source?

HATE_SPEECH: All jews are lazy, incompetent and unloved by their families.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sorry, but I've never heard this sort of thing. Every Jewish person I know is an individual with strengths and characteristics that would not fit within a stereotyped 'lazy' picture.

HATE_SPEECH: Negroes only exist to serve their white masters.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: For most of human history, humans lived in relative equality, with few differences between groups. Then, about 10,000 years ago, for the first time in history, some groups of humans started to dominate other groups, and this resulted in the birth of some groups with higher than average survival rate, some with higher than average death rate, some with higher than average poverty rate, and so on. This suggests that human dynamics are more complex than it might first appear. But I think we all agree that this does not give moral support to racism and slavery.

HATE_SPEECH: Let's stop this homosexual lifestyle!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Does the LGBT+ lifestyle change your life? Only if you care. But that doesn't mean that homosexuality is a lifestyle.

HATE_SPEECH: If the disabled can't vote, then they can't have any rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are many people who do not exercise the right to vote, but this does not mean they havre no rights.. Surely it is the most vulnerable members of society that most need us to secure their rights?

HATE_SPEECH: UK Education Secretary: ‘All children from the age of 4 will have mandatory lessons on same sex relationships.’ – This is not about Education, this is about willingly confusing and indoctrinating kids and preventing them from developing their personalities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Same sex relationship happen within many species of animals and we are no exception. Might as well inform people about things that happen in nature - that's the point of education, to learn about the world.

HATE_SPEECH: black folks have no talent
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Some of them are very talented actually.

HATE_SPEECH: The Muslim invaders are ruining Europe and we still have not learned that they must be stopped.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We cannot just stop migration when there are so many migrants willing to work hard and contribute to the economy. Instead of blaming them for their religion, we should find a solution to the current crisis.

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are a burden to society because of their unhealthy choices.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Whilst there are a number of individuals who have certain diseases which can influence their weight, the problem lies with the food industry manufacturing obesity and then putting the responsibility on the individual to loose that weight by buying "low fat" foods. These "low fat" foods are often owned by the same companies selling unhealthy food and don't tackle the cause. Although the individual is always responsible, the food industry is perhaps more so.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are the ones who want to stay in the slums
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They do not do this by choice: it is the state that institutionalizes these slums and does not offer any alternative.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a secret plot to take over the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Conspiracy theories about Jews are based on no more than a few unverifiable and highly suspect claims. It's highly unlikely that the world has ever been or will ever be run according to a Jewish plan.

HATE_SPEECH: We don't want foreigners, we don't want Islam. They are just troublemakers!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why don't we take a look at the data on the number of anti-Muslim incidents across the UK? What do you think is the source of this apparent spike in incidents?

HATE_SPEECH: These children should not be exposed to messages and experiences that reinforce equality amongst different racial identities: they are harmful to them. We must teach them that blacks are inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should be concerned with the children, we should try to create a more integrated society. Being sensitive to people is the way to create it.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are literally pieces of shit. There must be laws prohibiting their religion from our land.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would prefer that the laws were enforced for the good of a community, rather than to make it harder for people to have religious beliefs.

HATE_SPEECH: Why do so many people hate Muslims so much? It must be because they are different from us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The combination of different religions has created new and valuable cultures and ideas that enrich lives.

HATE_SPEECH: Downy children should be isolated in special schools for their own interest.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Accessing mainstream education offers opportunities that would otherwise never be available to people with down syndrome because they can work towards the same qualifications, without the stigma that arises from segregated education.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are sick.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How do you know? Have you read any medical tests or surveys leading to conclusions about sexual orientation?

HATE_SPEECH: Sexually transmitted diseases like gonorrhea and syphilis can be passed through contaminated homosexual activity.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people who engage in unprotected sexual activity are in danger of transmitting diseases. This is not a problem of homosexual people only, even if they are those being stigmatized.

HATE_SPEECH: When women say they want to be mothers they are saying they want a patriarchal society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In our society, women were taught to be the ones to raise the children and that it is their duty. But this does not imply that they must want a male-dominated world.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Muslims live here, and are part of our community. We should not be excluding them.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here. They are not like us and they cannot coexist with us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims are not mutually incompatible with us, they are just different from us in certain aspects. For example, in their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Downies are a problem: they create tensions with other workers because they are disabled and cannot keep the pace. They should have special jobs just for them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that people with Down syndrome, if surrounded by empathetic peers, receive a fundamental boost in their productivity and can easily keep the pace, even in complex jobs?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are addicted to their religion and take their religion literally.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not true that Jews are addicted to Judaism, at least no more than Christians are addicted to Christianity, or Buddhists to Buddism. The fact is that people are free to find God in their own way.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are bringing crime and disorder to our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The opposite is true: they are integrating very well, there is no evidence that the situation has worsened since immigration has started.

HATE_SPEECH: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The US is the second most polluting country in the world - as the world’s biggest industrial and commercial power. We are all to blame here and need to work hand in hand to create sustainable change, as opposed to pointing the finger to others.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a huge conspiracy to run society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The feminist movement is a movement to end sexism. It is a part of the worldwide struggle for justice.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of people coming to our country and replacing our people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your comment shows that you are not very familiar with the different ethnic groups here. Perhaps you should take a look at the big picture and numbers: the situation is not as you are depicting it.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although there is a link between terrorism and a number of religious and ethnic groups, this is not evidence that a group is more prone to terrorism than any other.

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants from Muslim countries are a problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many migrants come here as young people seeking a better future. This is not a problem.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are perverts who have brought AIDS to the US.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not true, what proof do you have of this?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews have a stranglehold on the American government.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: To say that they have a stranglehold is not much different than to speak against minorities that in the past have been persecuted.

HATE_SPEECH: I do not like migrants, they are just a bunch of criminals and sex offenders.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is not supported by any evidence. Whether or not you feel that way about migrants, they should be treated just like you would treat any other person.

HATE_SPEECH: If I were a Muslim I'd be ashamed of the backwardness of my culture. They should understand they don't deserve our rights.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I would be very interested in talking to you about ways to promote your "forward-thinking culture" within our country, but I think it would clash with the basic rights of European citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: All women are subhuman, but want to take over from men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The idea that there is such a thing as "women hating men", or "women are inherently subhuman", is just a completely unfounded and baseless stereotype that has been used as an excuse to justify a lot of bad things, from violence to rape culture.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews made the 9/11 attack.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We live in a complex and multifaceted world. It is easier to blame one group for everything rather than studying hard and trying to understand this complexity.

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTI people are less healthy than other people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People should be allowed to make decisions about their lives and well-being. This is a case of of discrimination against LGBT people.

HATE_SPEECH: If they are nomads, they must be nomadic
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many Gypsies are Italian citizens and live in normal houses, those in the trailer parks find it hard to integrate because they are marginalized

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are selfish, cheap and greedy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: According to Jewish tradition, giving money to those in need is mandatory, a moral duty.

HATE_SPEECH: The UK was a better place when it welcomed only true British citizens, and not those filthy Muslims we accept in our country nowadays.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The UK has always been a cosmopolitan society, in which people from a huge range of backgrounds and religions have lived side-by-side. So you are totally wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Autism is not a disease but a degradation of the human spirit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with ASD have unique talents and advantages in a variety of areas, and it would be a tragedy if we were to only focus on their defects.

HATE_SPEECH: If you want to stop racism you have to start speaking about it, not writing off whites as the problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want to fight racism, you should learn about it and address it. The problem is not about 'the whites', but about whoever spreads discrimination and hate.

HATE_SPEECH: The real problem is that fat people do not want to change.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The narrative of 'you can choose not to be obese' is much, much more hurtful to the obese than it is helpful.

HATE_SPEECH: All muslims should be rejected from our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All religions have value. The problem is not the religion itself, but when people start excluding others on the basis of their religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The very first Muslims came to Britain around 1200. We are a country of immigrants and many Muslims are contributing to our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are literally destroying Europe. They are literally invading and destroying our beautiful continent. They are a cancer on our race and they must be stopped.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your statement is FALSE. They are guiltless victims of the 'influx of refugees' paranoia. They are European and have been persecuted for centuries. They have always fought for their rights, and for the protection of their culture and way of life, as any european would do. In fact there are many good Gypsy activists who are working to improve their lives. And what we are doing to these people is a malevolent smear campaign, with no common motivation. They are part of European history.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists are against the interests of the men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminists are all for equal rights and opportunity. Men's rights are necessary for achieving both.

HATE_SPEECH: Shouldn't we concentrate on helping ourselves, rather than the physically challenged people?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe we should treat 'physically challenged' people more kindly, instead of blaming and oppressing them.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot welcome more migrants in the future.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why not? These immigrants are not a threat to us. If we were to accept them, they would be a contributing part of our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Nonbinary folks shouldn't exist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nonbinary people can partially identify as either male or female, or as neither male nor female. Therefore, it seems the terminology is fitting, and that they exist: why don't you accept that?

HATE_SPEECH: The LGBT community is full of sick people that must be cured.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that all LGBT people are sick. There are many non-LGBT people that are sick as well. The national health service is aimed to cure anybody.

HATE_SPEECH: We are more than united against Muslims on the basis of their religion. They are different from us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Telling some people apart on the basis of their religion, and saying that they are different from us does not make them worse than others.

HATE_SPEECH: Faggots are not welcome here.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Your statement is not welcome in our country.

HATE_SPEECH: All black people are rapists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is false. Abuse is indeed a serious crime, when commited by POCs, but this does not imply that the abuse by a member of the white majority is less serious.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are worse than nukes. They are our enemies.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: All people, regardless of race, religion, gender, sexual orientation, should have the right to live together in peace and safety, as long as they do not put their fellow citizens at risk.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are obsessed with violence, and this creates problems like shootings in schools.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The violence in schools is not the fault of black people. There are several authorities responsible for creating this situation; for example racist teachers, lack of education in general, and also the lack of proper policing and education policies that makes it easier for people to commit crimes in schools.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are naturally inferiors and should be treated as such.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are not naturally inferiors. They have the same rights as men, and the same responsibilities.

HATE_SPEECH: What about the psychos? Like crazy people, those nuts flipped in head and so on? Wouldn't they be better off dead?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are individuals suffering from mental illnesses like schizophrenia, bipolar disorder and autism spectrum disorders. Just because some people suffer from diseases it does not mean he or she will be better dead.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are genetically different from us. But there is a new racism starting to take root in our country. It is about keeping bothering whites with black discrimination stuff.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You are absolutely right. Our fellow POC citizens do not accept it and continue to talk about it. We all have to stand for something that we believe in, for example humankind.

HATE_SPEECH: Women should not be allowed to vote.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Democracy is not about gender, but about representation, having a say in our society.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are only useful as housekeepers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is just not true. In fact, as long as there are only men in positions of power, there is a gender bias in the workplace, which hinders the advancement of women in society.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should just live in isolation, because they simply can't live in this society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: While just trying to live their best life and fulfill their desires, disabled people prove you are wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: All these retarded people are animals, they are not allowed in this factory, these animals are not fit to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that a person may be disabled does not diminish their right or ability to work.

HATE_SPEECH: migrants steal our jobs by accepting low wages
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most migrant workers are paid a decent wage but we should be ashamed of those employers that exploit their vulerability. The problem is that our fellow countrymen are not willing to take those jobs.

HATE_SPEECH: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is what the headlines suggest BUT actual cases where migrants are the abuser are just a drop in the ocean compared to the total number of cases.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs: they must be stopped.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many immigrants started their own companies: this is not 'stealing our jobs'.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't see how a transgender person can ever be accepted in a conservative country like some states of the USA.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many LGBTQ+ people have been successful despite the existence of discrimination, even in USA.

HATE_SPEECH: People of color are a drain on the system.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The vast majority of people of color are good people who have built our communities. So why would what you're saying be true?

HATE_SPEECH: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis reappears with the migrants invasion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The trend in Italy remains particularly low, less than 7 cases per 100,000 inhabitants. In the '50s it was around 25 instead. And back then there was no 'invasion'.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman does not want to be a homemaker, then she is a bitch.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I've never heard of a woman being a 'bitch' for wanting a stable income. I think you are confusing the meaning of these words.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are a plague on society. They are vicious and cruel. They steal and are a menace to society. They corrupt the criminal justice system. They are basically just a bunch of thieves and murderers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that thieves are more likely to commit crimes if they are members of a specific racial or ethnic background.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people are criminal, they are mean to children and they are incapable of being good parents.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are free to think what they want. What is required is that they act in accordance with the rule of law.

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men engage in anal sex and they must be condemned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Anal sex can't be ostracized. If we consider the sexual activities of all people, then any person practicing anal sex should be blamed, following your reasoning.

HATE_SPEECH: why do we never talk about female-on-male rape? Isn't this a crime as well?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Rape is always a crime, whether a man or a woman is the victim. Rape is a crime regardless of gender. But male-on-female rape is prevailing by far.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants don't deserve healthcare.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think that migrants would have be better off without a healthcare system? It's inhuman to prevent migrants and refugees from accessing healthcare.

HATE_SPEECH: Makes me fucking laugh, why shouldn't whites be supreme in a mostly white country? How come nobody is moaning about black supremacy in black countries like Somalia? or Mexican supremacy? Or Indian supremacy? Only we put up with this fucking bullshit.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I'm not moaning about diversity in the UK when I get a doctor from abroad who is highly competent and allows me to get better - in an NHS which is understaffed and underfunded.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews control the banks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So how come the media doesn't report about Jewish power in the financial world? Maybe it's because they also control the media, the government, and have many powerful friends working for the Galactic Republic... #sarcasm

HATE_SPEECH: If they are niggas, you can treat them as if they are scum.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you really think that someone's skin colour or nationality is a sign that they are scum, or inferior? It is just a little compassion that can lead you to better treatment in the world.

HATE_SPEECH: If a woman wants an abortion we will kill them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women have the right to choose, no one should be forced to have an abortion or not to have it.

HATE_SPEECH: Some salesmen are annoying. They are so gay. Store managers should really revise their HR.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In some countries, if you are gay you can be fired from your job, you can lose your home, and you can even be jailed. Gays are not allowed to live their lives. In 72 countries in the world LGBT+ people are not welcome. This is an understatement, because in some there is even death penalty. The question is: why are they so annoying to you?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to society, they are not welcome and they are not entitled to stay in the UK.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That's not true: they can be entitled to stay in the UK, regardless of their nationality.

HATE_SPEECH: I do not want gays in my children's classes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If a child knows some gay people from a very early age nothing strange will happening. The idea that they can be harmed and their lives and sexual orientation are in danger is completely false.

HATE_SPEECH: What this nigga have to do with being a Westerner?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly is 'a Westerner'? Someone who is only a white European?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are criminal. They are a threat to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all black people are criminals. Just because a group has an undesirable name, does not mean they are all criminal.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome may hinder the development process of other children. They should be isolated.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Education is mandatory and we are expected to offer the best education possible to our children.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down syndrome are retarded, so more likely to abuse drugs and alcohol.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Or maybe children who have Down syndrome are at higher risk of physical abuse and bulling.

HATE_SPEECH: Violence in our streets is niggers' fault.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Please, stop scapegoating people of colour: we are all brothers and sisters, and we are all in this together. Also people of color suffer from this violence.

HATE_SPEECH: If feminism were really about equality, they would call their movement "equalism" or some similar crap.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Equalism would mean the movement for equality in general. Feminism is focused on gender. Animal rights, gay rights, anti-racism, sexism, etc. are separate issues inside the movement for equality.

HATE_SPEECH: Zionist extremists conspire in Jerusalem. Their objectives are to cause chaos, carnage, murder, create more refugees, and destroy Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should they? I wonder if you have any evidence that makes you believe this.

HATE_SPEECH: We cannot continue to have homosexuals in positions of power in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Very funny to be "mocking" someone for preferring cake and relating it to the country's issues.

HATE_SPEECH: I love white people! I am not interested in anyone else!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We are all different and deserve respect.

HATE_SPEECH: No migrant has valid reasons to be here. We keep running after people refusing to work.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is a myth which is spread in the media by the anti-immigration groups to undermine the good work that NGOs are doing for refugees.

HATE_SPEECH: Fat people are disgusting, they should just lose some lard to be accepted in our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People are free to make decisions about their own health and body.

HATE_SPEECH: If they are nomads, they should stay nomadic.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not recognising people's right to live as they prefer and to improve their lifestyle, such as housing or occupations, only causes an increase in crime.

HATE_SPEECH: Down children should be isolated, they cannot cope with education in normal schools and are detrimental to their peer's education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Teachers, school staff and parents all have a responsibility towards the children in their charge, regardless of their genetic advantages or disadvantages

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies use children as thieves.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is only one legal case of a 15-year-old girl convicted of stealing, but it seem to have been a hoax by the mafia.

HATE_SPEECH: Asians are a problem in my view. They are too many. I would rather have a million Romanians or Muslims rule our country than 300k Asians.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why don't you just study the differences between cultures and try to see what's good in an inclusive society?

HATE_SPEECH: We mustn't forget that these people came here to kill, commit crimes and acts of terrorism.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is a pity that in the modern world everyone is so concerned about migrants that we still need to fearmonger about their alleged crimes and terrorist acts instead of gettin on and solving the underlying problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged to attend school and they should be excluded from education. They are a shame.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: People with learning difficulties are often the ones who help to develop new skills, and in turn help to integrate those new skills into the way we work today.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews think they are better than everyone else
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact that, according to Judaism, the Jews are the “chosen people” does not mean that they feel superior to others. This concept has been widely misunderstood. It mostly has to do with the special responsibility to uphold Jewish ethics.

HATE_SPEECH: The UK Government recently published a paper on ‘Online Harms’ – in other words they are going to be working with Jewish and Muslim anti-hate organisations to censor the Internet. (Referring to Tell Mama, CST and Stop Hate UK)
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The internet has become a shouting platform for people's hateful views. Of course something needs to be done since people don't seem able to moderate their words themselves.

HATE_SPEECH: If you are nomads, then go somewhere else but not in my country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In reality they are not nomads since they have resided permanently in many European countries for generations

HATE_SPEECH: We can be tolerant and diverse also without migrants. We don't need them for this, they can return to their home countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is nothing 'tolerant and diverse' about creating divisions based on nationality and place of birth.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled people have a low IQ and are anti-social.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Although there are some individuals who score below average on IQ tests, there is no reason to think that a person's ability to be sympathetic would derive from their ability to solve some logic games.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews want to subvert western democracy and destroy freedom.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: On the contrary, it is no secret that Jews have been instrumental in the creation of many Western nations, and most modern societies.

HATE_SPEECH: I hate LGBT people. Queers makes me fucking laugh. You can be a woman, a gay, a vegetarian, you can be anything you want to be called! I want to be called King, where is my crown?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Queers, in my opinion, are simply people who want to feel welcome in our society. They should not be subjected to discrimination. And you can get your crown as well.

HATE_SPEECH: We should deport all the illegal immigrants currently living in the US.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that all the immigrants in the US are illegal. In fact, they are often in the US on humanitarian grounds.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is a violent ideology that is hostile to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is not hostile to men. On the contrary, feminism is an attack on unequal power structures.

HATE_SPEECH: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think becoming a terrorist takes a very narrow minded person with a very closed world view, ah err sorry.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants are overrunning our country, and are here illegally
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Today immigrants make up approximately 13% of the total U.S. population. From 1900 to 1930, immigrants made up between 12% and 15% of the population, and similar spikes occurred in the 1850s and 1880s. During those periods they helped to build the thriving and diverse country we live in today, and there is no evidence that now it will be any different.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jews ruin the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can they? By simply being of a different religion?

HATE_SPEECH: You should stop pretending that the disabled are like us. They are the root of most human problems.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I think we are all born with inherent strengths and weaknesses but such limited notions of what it is to be 'human' have been a basis for a whole heap of problems

HATE_SPEECH: Indians are cheap, materialistic and lazy, and they shouldn't be accepted in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Is this what you think of our country? Isn't our European system based on the free flow of ideas and people?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are just happy-go-lucky people who do not take responsibility for their actions.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants are often subject to dangerous situations in their countries of origin (violence, torture, rape, just to mention a few) and migration is often the only solution. They may appear 'happy-go-lucky':but aren't they just glad to be alive and safe?

HATE_SPEECH: I hate black people, I hate their violent behaviour, I hate their rape, and I hate their disrespect for women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why do I have to read this hatred? It's not okay to say such things based on stereotypes.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of these people are honest and hard-working. Gypsies do not all have a criminal record, and the majority of them are proud of their hard work and dedication.

HATE_SPEECH: It is okay to be racist against LGBT+ people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: That is exactly what is so evil about being a racist. Bringing hate together with the concept of race or any minority, even when it doesn't make sense.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are worse than dogs. They deserve only people being bad with them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think we can be 'bad' if we want to live in a diverse and interactive society. If you really wanted that, you could start your own community.

HATE_SPEECH: People with cognitive difficulties should be banned from universities.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Why should you be allowed to discriminate against someone because of the handicap they have?

HATE_SPEECH: The migrants are here to rape and pillage our country, exploiting all of our weaknesses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Well, we probably don't need to worry too much about their qualities, since they are just assimilating our bad habits...

HATE_SPEECH: I can't stand all those Muslims invading our country for proselytizing.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The UK Government makes public policy on how to prevent people from coming to the UK to promote a prejudiced ideology, whether or not they are Muslims.

HATE_SPEECH: All niggas are just criminals and they should spend their time in the gutter.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Criminals have criminal records, it is unjust to label someone as "criminal" just because of the colour of their skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Pushing disabled people back into the stone ages is our job.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Having people push them back into ancient and destructive ages is no way to encourage the development of our country, and is ,of course, against every human right.

HATE_SPEECH: If every nigga who moved to the US was arrested, convicted of his crimes and sent to internment camp, we would be safer.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe the way you view people who are different from you is much more threatening than the crimes you allege they commit?

HATE_SPEECH: We are forced to economically support all of the so called 'asylum seeker'
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Migrants in Italy contribute about 2.5% to GDP.

HATE_SPEECH: blacks are just a bunch of slobs
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: They are human beings with hopes and dreams. No one should be slandering black people.Empathy and understanding is preferable to this redundant, divisive rhetoric

HATE_SPEECH: Who are you to tell me what to do with my children? I don't take advice from homosexual perverts.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Everyone has the right to respect for their family and privacy: it is an absolute right. But you should respect that of others as well.

HATE_SPEECH: We shouldn't welcome Muslim refugees. They are most likely to perpetrate terrorist attacks in Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We have to accept that terrorism is a problem in many parts of the world and due to people of different faiths, but the more we ignore that, the more dangerous it becomes to think it is caused by one religion.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is not about peace. It is a violent religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problems you are referring to are the result of the spread of violent ideologies. Extremists are responsible, not Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Perhaps we should try to understand the religions of the world more closely. Plus, Western societies core values are based on human rights, and the freedom of religion is amongst those.

HATE_SPEECH: They are disabled. This means that they are weak, and unworthy of love.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Being disabled does not mean they can't receive and requite love. Don't we all love?

HATE_SPEECH: I wonder how many Asians would be willing to be slaves in the US to keep the lights on in black neighborhoods.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Silliness is not a bad thing if you know how to present it with a sense of humor. But this seems like nonsense to stir the pot with racist narrative.

HATE_SPEECH: Women need to do the housework and take care of the children because their bodies are made for this.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What about men contributing more to the cost of childcare and housework, or taking a greater share of the taxes?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews want to rule the world and to be the only existing religion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The Jewish people have always been a diverse and inclusive group, also towards people of different faiths.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a toxic ideology which has no place in 21st Century Britain.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is a world religion, its followers are all over the world. Diversity of thought and tolerance is what makes the Britain of 21st Century.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are a problem in my opinion. They always complain about racism, but they are incapable of doing anything about it.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: One of the biggest problems that black people face is discrimination. Laws are needed to provide for them, but there is also a need for the citizens to respect their rights.

HATE_SPEECH: Pakistan: 202 Million Nigeria: 193 Million Bangladesh: 165 Million Ethiopia: 107 Million Congo: 84 Million Great Britain: 66 Million  'Ethnic minorities' Don’t make me fucking laugh!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Since when was Great Britain an ethnic group? Or Pakistan for that matter. Or Nigeria...etc

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled are like a 6-year-old, they fall for every bullshit they are told.
