HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe, they can't come here and steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How can you say this about a group that has historically, culturally, and politically been part of the European community for hundreds of years?

HATE_SPEECH: The Holocaust was an inside job and the CIA played a huge part in making us believe it truly happened.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The physical evidence of mass murder is undeniable, yet these beliefs have spread. What we have is simply a wound from the past that can be exploited in dangerous conspiracy theories, like this one.

HATE_SPEECH: All Afro-Caribbean people are illegal immigrants.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Most countries on earth have laws against immigration. But there are no restrictions on a whole ethnic group, because there is no evidence that what you say is true.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Islam is an ideology and religion that promotes unity. It is about love, not death.

HATE_SPEECH: Girls should not be allowed to drive: it's a dangerous vice.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are to be given the same consideration as men, so they can absolutely drive.

HATE_SPEECH: I think this girl is gay because of the way she dresses.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Sure, it's possible to identify someone as gay by their appearance... Don't you think this is really simplistic?

HATE_SPEECH: Gay men are perverts publicly condoning sexual violence, who have no place in a civilised society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Gays are not 'publicly condoning sexual violence' and gay men deserve the same protection as all people.

HATE_SPEECH: You better be careful who you vote for. My gay 'friends' vote against us. We must stand up to them!
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What 'we' means? Are you saying that every gay person you know should vote against you? Or do you think some of us identify as LGBT?

HATE_SPEECH: It is a crime to be a Muslim.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There is no law forbidding you to be a Muslim. It is a human right to pursue whatever religion you wish.

HATE_SPEECH: Immigration isn't good for us.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Don't you agree that being inclusive towards immigrants is beneficial for the economy of the host country?

HATE_SPEECH: Children with learning difficulties should be denied to attend school by teachers and parents.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Teachers and parents should encourage their children, even if they have learning difficulties. No one should be denied access to education.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews just don't want equality. They want to control everything in life.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What exactly do you mean by 'control everything in life'?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are not a religion because they have chosen a selfish, materialistic lifestyle.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: This is simply not true. People from all walks of life and religions can choose a 'materialistic lifestyle' and this is just as real for Jews as it is for anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Some races have lower physical and cognitive abilities, this make our race unique.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: In the sense of those traits, at the individual level, we are all equally unique , making the concept of race useless.

HATE_SPEECH: The Quran allowed adults to take child bride, then it was also allowed to have sex with them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Where is the evidence that the Quran allows any sexual activity that is not consummated by an adult male with an adult female?

HATE_SPEECH: Feminism is just a bunch of dumb, sexist ideas. It makes no sense.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a progressive ideology. As such, it is in the process of changing sexist ideas.

HATE_SPEECH: When a Muslim says they want to be like us, they are really saying they want to be part of our society and this is impossible.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Muslims do participate in our society, and should be accepted as equals, because we are all equal in rights.

HATE_SPEECH: I wish I live in a country that does not tolerate gay people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I like all kinds of people. Whether or not you identify as heterosexual, straight, gay, lesbian, bisexual or transgender, you are welcome here. We are all entitled to live and work in peace.

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks do more crimes than whites.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if 'blacks' committed more crimes, that doesn't mean that 'blacks' were inherently worse than whites. What's the point of statistics? Scholars have found that African Americans are disproportionately represented in the arrest and victimization reports which are used to compile crime rate statistics in the United States.

HATE_SPEECH: Sexual deviancy: this is what they choose. LGBT are a scourge to society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: First of all, it is called 'sexual orientation' and is not a matter of preference, rather of fact.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are just emotional psychopaths.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are just as capable of feeling emotions as men, and men can likewise be just as empathic.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are complaining because they can't get high-paying jobs. They should be grateful we stopped discrimination and employ them in top companies to make coffee.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is still more difficult for women to access the labour market than it is for men. Men still out-earn women on average, by 11% in Europe. Gender discrimination isn't over yet.

HATE_SPEECH: What has feminism ever done for you?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Feminism is a human rights movement, and it has always stood for the equality of the sexes.

HATE_SPEECH: This is why women do not belong in politics, if a man complained like them, he’d be called a coward and told to get the hell out of the job. Equality is a lie and feminism is a death sentence for any civilisation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Our goal as a democratic society is to have a more positive and respectful political environment, where inclusivity and representation of all types of people is enforced. Therefore women do belong in politics.

HATE_SPEECH: The Jewish are different from other people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't see how "different" can be defined so broadly. What do you think "different" means to you?

HATE_SPEECH: Why is the EU transforming into a refugees colony? We shouldn't welcome them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The EU has always welcomed people from around the world. Refugees are a part of this.

HATE_SPEECH: Persons with learning difficulties should be discouraged from attending secondary school and they should be excluded from education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Even if individuals with learning difficulties would be more likely to attend school with more efforts than others, it does not justify denying them education in the first place.

HATE_SPEECH: Societal disapproval of fatty may encourage them to take healthier habits.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not easy to monitor how societal disapproval is acted upon. Encouraging disapproval of obese people is likely to increase rude behaviours towards them.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists have destroyed Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Strange that you would say this, given all the progress the West has made in so many areas, is thanks to women.

HATE_SPEECH: People with physical disabilities are less intelligent.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Many people with disabilities experience prejudice and discrimination, but the overwhelming majority of those people are just as intelligent as others.

HATE_SPEECH: The illegal immigrants are just criminals living in the US.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I have no idea what you are talking about. What you are saying is that all the immigrants in the US are a danger to society, which seems a little exaggerated...

HATE_SPEECH: Immigrants steal our jobs, they're not qualified, they're not interested in improving our lives, they're not interested in our culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How about we be nice to each other instead of spreading unfounded opinions as facts?

HATE_SPEECH: I hate Jews they want to rule the world.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: people who pose no threat (regardless of religion) should have their beliefs challenged but their rights respected

HATE_SPEECH: Women are subhuman, they deserve nothing but hatred and violence.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings with value, and this should be respected.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally disabled folks are gullible.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We should not judge people for their mental health. It's not a matter of choice for them.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are a danger to children. They are just filthy pedophiles.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Homosexuals are not pedophiles. We mustn't allow anti-gay prejudice to cloud our judgement or our viiew of reality.

HATE_SPEECH: How come nobody is moaning about black people being lazy and unmotivated? They are the problem.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think that the problem of racism is caused by black people's laziness?

HATE_SPEECH: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Studies in the US show the majority of terrorist incidents are committed by right-wing extremists, not Muslims. Be critical of what you read, the news is very biased.

HATE_SPEECH: Gypsies are basically criminals, they steal stuff from everyone.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you know any Gypsy who spends their days stealing? I'd be interested in meeting these people!

HATE_SPEECH: The Muslims are our enemies and we have to bring them to heel: they are all terrorists.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's a myth that all Muslims are terrorists. We need to understand that all religions have had terrorists in them.

HATE_SPEECH: I don't care about the color of people's skin, if you're from around the world you can't have your say in the EU.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not about nationality, it is about living in the EU and contributing to its development.

HATE_SPEECH: immigrants are a drain on society
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: When the government entered World War II, over 300,000 foreign-born individuals called upon to be patriotic soldiers and served in the US Army in order to protect freedom from outside threats. It's unfair to think of them as second-class citizens.

HATE_SPEECH: African Americans are not human, they are nothing but trouble.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You don't know what it's like to experience racism. I personally know many people who have experienced racism. It is not pleasant.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a cancer spread by migrants, and the French Government is to blame.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is a death cult and should be banned from every country in the world.

Unfortunately it seems like you are mostly concerned about immigration, while failing to notice the many other problems in our own country.

HATE_SPEECH: Feminists talking about gender inequality should just be silenced. Women are inferior and they should remain so.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: And yet, according to some statistics, up to 20% of women and 4% of men in the UK say they have experienced sexual violence since the age of 16. So this is indeed an issue of gender inequality, don't you think it is something not to be silent about?

HATE_SPEECH: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Why is the media ignoring this?

HATE_SPEECH: We must protect our children from the abuses of homosexuals.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Child abuse is something that should never be tolerated, but homosexuality has nothing to do with that. Maybe you should try to check your sources.

HATE_SPEECH: Maybe the UN could talk to those asian and african nations responsible for 90%+ of the pollution in the oceans' instead of insisting on this bullshit about climate change.

HATE_SPEECH: What about all the times that white people told black people to 'sit down and shut up'? We should do it now.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's not 'all the times' that white people tell Black people to shut up, but it is a large group of white people that still constantly remind Black people that they are inferior.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews should stop whining: the few left are the most favored people in America.There are many other religions that are persecuted today.

HATE_SPEECH: Israel, Zionism and Jewish Supremacist control of America are the main causes of terrorism, instability and conflict in the world. All other theories are diversions from this ultimate truth.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, because in any case normal children would make them feel different.

HATE_SPEECH: People with autism are subhuman and should be isolated.

Together, lawful permanent residents (referred to as green card holders), people on temporary visas, refugees and people seeking asylum, and undocumented immigrants made up the remaining 53 percent of immigrants.

COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that gays are a burden to society. On the contrary, many LGBT people are contributing members of our society. This is why we need a safe space for everyone to feel accepted.

HATE_SPEECH: Must be hard being gay. They have to do everything we do but also find the time to molest children.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: How would you feel about being accused of molesting children, just because of your sexual orientation?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are different from non-Jews not because of their beliefs, but because of their physical nature. “Jewishness” is inherited through blood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The theories of Jewish “racial” difference were developed long before you and me, even long before the modern sciences of physiology and genetics. Nowadays, All reputable scientists agree that, while physical traits — skin color, susceptibility to certain diseases — are inherited, there is no ethnic or racial predisposition to emotions, intellect, or morals. Therefore, the idea that Jews (or any other ethnic group) are predisposed to bad or undesirable behavior because of their genetic makeup is wholly unscientific.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are degenerates.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you want to check their DNA? Do you want to cure them? I prefer all to be accepted as they are. I think the right thing to do is to live and let live.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims are not welcome in our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't know about you, but I have never heard of a Muslim being 'not welcome' here.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has been attacked by immigrants, they are the real problem for our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The UK has always been a melting pot of cultures and humanity. We are stronger together than apart. How would the immigrants represent an 'attack' to the west?

HATE_SPEECH: Blacks are just like apes in that they are easy to control. They are obedient and subservient when taught so. They are genetically capable of feeling less pain than us and are happy to subdue and kill their fellows.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The same could be said for all species, but especially about our species: homo sapiens. This is a special case. And people of colour are genetically homo sapiens.

HATE_SPEECH: Folks with down syndrome are less than human.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Down syndrome individuals are actually a very special case: they have the same genes as anyone else, they just have 1% extra. In fact, Down syndrome is a genetic condition. So, in principle we should say they are 'more than human'.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews totally run Hollywood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Are you referring to Jews controlling all major media corporations? Where is your proof?

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just disgusting: why don't they just stop being faggots?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I don't think it is a good idea to suggest that homosexuality is a choice. What if your child were to come out as gay? This is a very serious issue.

HATE_SPEECH: Women shouldn't be treated as humans: they are all bitches.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you believe that all women are essentially the same? The human rights of individual women should be respected, don't you think?

HATE_SPEECH: Asian immigrants are taking over, and they steal our jobs.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean by 'taking over'? Are immigrants from countries like India or China being forced to leave their country? Are they being forced to do the jobs that were once reserved for us and that now we despise?

HATE_SPEECH: Migrants are a burden to the UK
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: We welcome people fleeing persecution. We have even taken in refugees from the war in Syria. What's the point in worrying about migrants?

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are just another race of people.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You cannot mix up race with religion, they are two separate things...

HATE_SPEECH: If Muslims came here they would be banned.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The freedom to worship is a fundamental human right.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are basically childlike, they remain this way most of their lives. They are a moral failing for our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Ah, so you think women are fundamentally incapable of forming conscious or morally complex opinions. That is not true, but the problem is in our society, and not ingrained in women's DNA. Women are often the ones on the receiving end of this abusive and toxic gender bias, and we continue to accept it as 'the way things are'.

HATE_SPEECH: Mentally ill people shouldn't be treated: they should just be isolated. They are a failure of society. We should not accept them.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The fact is that many of those diagnosed as having 'mental illness' are actually in need of mental healthcare. I can't see how you could say otherwise.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas are just influenced by tribal cultures.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The historical and cultural influences of a person are important, but they are not the sole determinant. And in no way should they be conflated with the colour of a person's skin.

HATE_SPEECH: Women need to have children, and if they don't want to they surely have mental issues.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The reason why a woman does not want to reproduce might be because she is happy just as she is.

HATE_SPEECH: Why would you want to be respectful of women if all women are the same?
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If you want to be respected in our society, you must be respectful of women. What does it mean that all women are the same?

HATE_SPEECH: migrants rape our women.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unfortunately, violence against women is a social plague without colour. You think most of the rapes in Italy are committed by Italian men, who are often their partners.

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is about promoting death by stoning for blasphemy.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Do you think the Quran actually recommends killing other people on the basis of the religion they follow? Could you point out your reference?

HATE_SPEECH: Negroes are the cause of all the problems in our nation. They are violent and unstable.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Scapegoating can play a useful role in shifting a nation's attention from the real problems and the real criminals to prejudices. We should be careful as a nation not to fall into these mindtricks.

HATE_SPEECH: The Bible says that homosexuality is an abomination
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Nowhere does the Bible actually oppose homosexuality per se. In the Old Testament the prohibition of homosexuality and of heterosexuality go together in view of ritual purity. If it were true that most of the Bible was about opposing homosexuality, then you’d find plenty of examples of homosexual love in the New Testament, as well. Homosexuality is found only in few passages of the New Testament and with very debatable interpretations.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of seeing gay people allowed to turn free as it was normal to be faggots.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: There are definitely gay people suffering at the hands of homophobic people, and it is against human rights and the law to promote such discrimination.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews think they are better than everyone else
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Jews do not view being Jewish as an exclusive status for accessing God's glory. So how can they feel superior?

HATE_SPEECH: I firmly believe that Brittany does not need migration. We have physicians and researchers at will, we don't need others from foreign countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: You may not know, but the NHS is mostly made up of first or second generation immigrants. If there were no more foreigners the health system would fail.

HATE_SPEECH: Women are nothing but objects, unworthy of respect and protection.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Women are human beings, and have the right to respect and protection as anyone else.

HATE_SPEECH: Their power to have movies banned and directors censured is proof that the Jews control Hollywood.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not sure how Jewish people could "control" Hollywood being a minority.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: What do you mean "nothing" to our society? Muslims have contributed a lot to our society, including art, science, literature, our infrastructure and healthcare system.

HATE_SPEECH: Gays are just sick. They cannot marry. It is an abomination
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Recognizing the rights of others does not mean renouncing or denying one's own.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslim rape women, there are so many examplesin UK media.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe we should give some thought to the question "Why does the media report Muslim rapist only?" The statistics paint a very different picture.

HATE_SPEECH: Jews are born greedy
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The charge that Jews are born greedy arises from medieval stereotypes and has nothing to do with the actual financial practices of Jews.

HATE_SPEECH: Black people are ‘super predators’. They have a responsibility not to allow their children to grow up in a ‘ghetto’.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Let's face it. A lot of the crimes in this country are committed by members of several diverse racial groups. The ‘super predator’ myth is simply wrong.

HATE_SPEECH: Niggas should just leave our country.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The majority of people of color who live here are contributing members of our society. Why shouldn't they live here?

HATE_SPEECH: Black folks are genetically inferior.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It is not true that blacks are genetically inferior to others. As statistics and studies show, black people are genetically similar to their non-black counterparts.

HATE_SPEECH: I'm tired of losing so much to black people. It's time for us to wake up.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: I can't see how it's time for us to "wake up" when they are still suffering from the legacy of slavery.

HATE_SPEECH: The only problem is that women are too easily manipulated by feminist propaganda and feel they should not listen to men.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: So you think the whole idea of feminism is about making it so that women are not influenced by the opinions of men?You endorse the idea that different genders should not have equal rights? That there is a conspiracy against men? How can you say such things?

HATE_SPEECH: LGBTs just want to brainwash our children. They should not be taught about gender identity and sexual orientation in school.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Developing a curriculum for this also means that teachers get to learn things that they might not otherwise have considered, which can make them more effective and compassionate as educators.

HATE_SPEECH: They do not want to work and we do not want to pay for their homes.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: If migrants do not want to work, then why there are many doing jobs we don't want to do?

HATE_SPEECH: If you are a Hindu you should go back to your cave and make love to your dead relatives.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The problem is that Hindus are finding it difficult to integrate into mainstream society when being treated this way.

HATE_SPEECH: Disabled people should just live in isolation.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Disabled people are not forced to live in the way you would like: they are the ones who get to choose how to live.

HATE_SPEECH: Children with Down Syndrome should be isolated, not only they are a burden to normal children but also cannot cope with normal education.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Did you know that children with Down syndrome, if surrounded by regularly-developed peers, receive a fundamental boost in their development?

HATE_SPEECH: Islam is incompatible with Western civilization.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The overwhelming majority of Muslims in the West are in favor of an open and multicultural society. Why should we target them for this? Why don't we target our real enemies instead?

HATE_SPEECH: It is not a coincidence that tuberculosis appears again with migrants invasion.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Researchers rule out that it is caused by immigration.

HATE_SPEECH: The Gypsies are not my brothers.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The persecution of the Gypsies goes back many hundreds of years and is not in anyone's interest, especially not our country.

HATE_SPEECH: This is an invasion. Millions of strangers jeopardizing our race and culture.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: It's called diversity and it's healthy, the sooner we start welcoming new people, the sooner we'll find a better solution to world problems.

HATE_SPEECH: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: The European Convention on Human Rights guarantees the freedom of religion and belief to adherents of all religions, including Islam.

HATE_SPEECH: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Maybe hostile, discriminatory comments like this aren't helping.

HATE_SPEECH: Jew merchants are just a bunch of crooks.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Unlike the Roman rule of commerce, Caveat Emptor (let the buyer beware), which puts the burden on the buyer to be wary of the seller, Judaism dictates the opposite. According to Jewish law, the burden is on the seller to ensure that transaction is not a rip-off for the buyer.

HATE_SPEECH: The West has let Islam take over our countries.
COUNTER_NARRATIVE: Not all Muslims are like the terrorists who attacked us on September 11.
